A gift to you for taking such good care of the girls."@@ You looked back in the mirror and your sister's grinning face. The party had been pretty fun. Freed from the burden of babysitting and the looming threat of regression it'd be even more fun. A wide smile crept onto your face, showing off your @@.girlVoice;missing teeth@@, and you nodded. Emily cheered and grabbed your hand, dragging you off towards her room. @@.emilyVoice;"Come on, you can take off the necklace later. Let's play first."@@ Your smile only got wider. The party had been so much fun, and now you could go back into that form whenever you wanted. Considering the way the both of you were smiling, you doubted this would be the last time. [[Finish the party|Golden Ending 7]]There wasn't much time left before the girls had to go home but you all intended to make the most of it. Now that mom was here you didn't have to worry about the girls getting into trouble. In fact you weren't above starting a little trouble of your own. It was equal parts embarrassing and amusing listening to your mother admonish you about being careful when you'd taken things a @@.girlVoice;little too far@@. Even she had to laugh after she finished the lecture. Since you were that @@.girlVoice;small@@ she'd fallen into the same patterns as she did when lecturing Emily. But it did work, and for the last hour you did you best to behave...@@.girlVoice;mostly@@. But all good things must come to an end and waving goodbye to the girls felt rather sad. A day ago you'd been dreading the idea of spending a few hours with them and now you didn't want to see them leave. They hadn't been the biggest fans of you either. It had only been a day, but things had changed quite a lot. Maybe seeing you regressing and playing with them had changed their opinions on you. <<if $oldPlayerAge <= 9>>Being forced to look them in the eye, or @@.girlVoice;look up@@ to them in the case of Sophie, had certainly changed yours.<</if>> Though just because they were gone didn't mean that the fun was over. After all your sister was more than happy to keep the party going, just the two of you. Without a 'smelly big brother' to deal with, she didn't need to hold back on her more exuberant tendencies. You weren't sure if you were supposed to be offended at being called smelly. Technically you weren't even a big brother right now, so you filed that one away for later consideration and counter teasing. Naturally, now that you were basically her size, she couldn't resist the urge to try and dress you up. Her closet was huge, so there was no time for everything, but if it was @@.girlVoice;cute@@, or @@.girlVoice;girly@@, or @@.girlVoice;pink@@, she wanted to see you in it. Even you had to admit they were improvements over the @@.girlVoice;oversized t-shirt@@ you'd been running around in, as @@.girlVoice;cute@@ as it had been. [[Bed time|Golden Ending 8]]@@.girlVoice;Mommy@@ put an end to the fun. Bed time was nigh and both of you had school in the morning, though neither of you were looking forward to it. Still, it wasn't like @@.girlVoice;mommy@@ was taking the necklace away, that was the whole point after all. You'd have it and be able to use it whenever you wanted, even if @@.girlVoice;mommy@@ or Emily wasn't around. That was something you hadn't fully considered. Right now it was something you'd use to play with the other girls, but technically you could just use it on your own. There wasn't a compelling reason why you would do so, but the possibility did exist. A possibility you rapidly found yourself indulging in. After a particularly onerous week at high school, @@.girlVoice;relaxing and having some fun@@ with Emily seemed like just the thing the doctor ordered...the witch ordered? You weren't the only one who saw the potential advantages in the situation. Admittance was cheap for kids @@.girlVoice;under twelve@@. The movies, the zoo, museums, there were discounts as far as the eye could see. <<if $traitCatgirl>>You were even @@.girlVoice;cute enough@@ that no one questioned the fact you had ears and a tail. Everyone just assumed it was an @@.girlVoice;adorable@@ costume.<</if>> Meals were also cheaper, since you didn't need to eat as much. Though you didn't understand the mechanics of calorie counting when you kept changing size. Of course you attended more sleepovers, initially only when they were at your house to keep explanations to a minimum. But once the other girls had let your name slip enough times, no one questioned it when you went over there as well. Eventually mom had to put a limit on the number of them, otherwise she would have to host one every other weekend. [[You thought back on all the adventures you'd had|Golden Ending Vignettes]]Everything went on fine for a while, swapping back and forth nearly at a whim and living this pseudo-double life. Sure you didn't go to school as a @@.girlVoice;little girl@@ but you spent whole days that way, you even met some of Emily's classmates. The necklace was always on your person, only taking it off to shower. It wasn't that you needed to transform all the time, but the swapping felt like it was a part of you. This ignorant bliss didn't last forever. At first it was just a few minor points, having to rush to finish homework you'd forgotten, not hanging out with your high school acquaintances, a general lack of focus on your future. It was damaging your performance at high school life, and it was getting worse. As a result, when you were a @@.girlVoice;little girl@@ you found yourself more and more anxious about what you were neglecting. Concerns about the time you were 'wasting' preventing you from really @@.girlVoice;having fun@@ with the girls. Everything came to a head, at least in your mind, near the end of a boring Tuesday. You were sitting in a rather boring History class, not particularly paying attention to the lesson. You'd already gotten a small lecture about forgotten homework, which had demotivated you even more. Instead of taking notes you'd been doodling little flowers in the margins. At that moment you realized that you didn't want to be here, you didn't want to do any of this boring teenage stuff anymore. Gritting your teeth you pushed the way through the rest of the day before rushing home. You sat on your bed, amulet in hand, and considered the situation. Living two separate lives wasn't going to work, at least not like it was going. Whenever life got too hard or too boring, there was too much temptation to retreat into your @@.girlVoice;little pink happy go lucky world@@. That wasn't dealing with life, that was escaping it, sure it wasn't drugs or drink, but it still didn't seem healthy. [[What to do...|Golden Ending 10]]<<if $oldGirlName === "">>\ <<set $tempGirlName to $emilyGirlNames.random()>>\ <<else>>\ <<set $tempGirlName to $oldGirlName>>\ <</if>>\ You turned the amulet over and over in your hand. It wasn't that you'd have to stop using it entirely, it'd just have to become an intentional occasional diversion. Making sure that your 'real' life was handled before you logged off and focused on @@.girlVoice;unicorns and coloring books@@. But if it wasn't an escape? What if that was just your life? What if you spent //all// of your time as @@.girlVoice;$tempGirlName@@? <<if $oldGirlName === "">>A name Emily had decided upon one day, and felt @@.girlVoice;too right@@ to say no.<</if>> If you stayed as @@.girlVoice;$tempGirlName@@ you wouldn't be escaping anything. It would just be your life. Every day could be @@.girlVoice;unicorns and coloring@@ and you wouldn't be ignoring other 'more important' things. The more you thought on it the more the idea loomed large in your mind. It had all started at the sleepover, all the fun you'd had, the friends you'd made. How natural it felt to act more and more like a little girl. It made you feel like the rest of your life might have been a mistake, that //this// is what you were meant to be. The intervening months had only driven that idea home. You felt better as a @@.girlVoice;little girl@@ than you ever had as a teenage boy. Regardless you were going to have to make a choice, you couldn't let things keep going this way. It would end up ruining both worlds if the cracks continued to deeper. Did you want to prioritize the world you'd lived in until now? Or trade it out for one that you loved? [[Keep your old life|Golden Ending Stay Old 1]] [[Start a new one|Golden Ending Stay Young 1]]You stood up from your bed, gripping the amulet hard, walking over and dropping it into one of the drawers of your desk. It was still there, you knew where it was, but it was out of sight and hopefully out of mind. You'd get it when you had occasion to, but it wouldn't be the first thing you reached for. Mom understood when you explained your decision to her. She'd actually planned on bringing up something similar. Though she had to admit that she'd been enjoying herself as well, brushing some concerns under the rug. Emily was somewhat disappointed, she also had been having fun with her new sister. But, now that the two of you had grown a little closer, she didn't mind as much. Having an older brother did come with advantages, and now that you were acting like a good one, she actually liked enjoyed it. You did still have the amulet though over time you used it less and less. Mom had the idea to make it a kind of an heirloom. If you had children, they might, on occasion, benefit from a change in perspective. You joked that some of your classmates could use that same perspective shift. Mom smiled but said it wouldn't work on anyone who wasn't in the family. But that was a question to deal with far in the future. Still, you could always use it to unwind from time to time. There was nothing more relaxing then spending an afternoon with a good @@.girlVoice;coloring book@@, letting the @@.girlVoice;big kids@@ deal with the rest of the problems of the world. Ending 1b: Invokio Amulet <<include "Post Ending Choices">> <<saveEnding "all" 7>><<silently>>\ <<set $playerAge to $ringPlayerAge>> <<set $playerMaturity to $ringPlayerMaturity>> <</silently>>\ You slipped the amulet back on. Forget that @@.girlVoice;old boring life@@. You'd never made anything of it in the first place, would anyone even notice if you were gone? Meanwhile you had an entire gaggle of friends ready and waiting in your @@.girlVoice;younger pinker life@@. Which just left the question of how exactly you were going to make it happen? Could you just ask mom directly? What if you transformed yourself and then 'lost' the amulet? Was staying this way even possible? You knocked on the door of the only person who would understand you, and know enough to maybe help you. @@.emilyVoice;"<<playerName>>! What's up?"@@ Her eyes lit up, @@.emilyVoice;"did you want to play dress up?"@@ You smiled, this sort of thing was a large part of why you wanted to make this change. Who didn't love @@.girlVoice;dress up@@? Emily took your smile as confirmation and ushered you in. You'd intended to have this conversation in your teenage form, but now that you were in here it felt awkward. You instead used the necklace to make yourself $playerAge again. You watched as Emily rifled through her closet for something to put you in. The two of you had tried on basically everything in there, but that didn't make it less fun. You were @@.girlVoice;wiggling@@ into your second outfit before you worked up the courage to start really talking. [[Start the conversation|Golden Ending Stay Young 2]] <<set $girlName to $tempGirlName>><<playerVoice "\"Emily,\"">> the gravity of your voice caught her attention, <<playerVoice "\"I actually wanted to talk to you about something.\"">> In the pause you could see the conflict in Emily's eyes. You could see the litany of snarky comebacks whirring through her mind. Before the party she would have unleashed on you, but now she was more worried about your feelings, @@.emilyVoice;"What is it <<playerName>>? Did you want to borrow a dress?"@@ Borrow a dress? You never would have come to ask that. Unless she actually had worked out what was coming and was trying to give you an easy segue into it. <<playerVoice "\"No I...I mean I could, but I was wondering if you knew if it was possible to...\"">> you let your words trail off, this was harder than you'd expected. How were you supposed to admit to your 'little' sister that you wanted to stay $playerAge? Emily smiled, @@.emilyVoice;"Keep talking, I'll find the perfect dress for you."@@ Despite her instruction you still didn't know what to say, instead staying quiet until she pulled out the @@.girlVoice;cutest dress you'd ever seen@@. She saw your eyes widen at the sight of it, @@.emilyVoice;"I knew you would like this one."@@ Before you could protest she'd already pushed it into your hands. @@.emilyVoice;"Try it on, try it on!"@@ You'd never seen this dress before, had Emily just gotten it? It even sounded like she'd gotten it specifically for you...but why would she do that? It's not like you'd needed your own clothes. [[Try on the dress|Golden Ending Stay Young 3]]Emily was right, the dress was @@.girlVoice;perfect@@. Not only did it look @@.girlVoice;cute@@, but it fit you perfectly. Magic made sure that everything from Emily's closet mostly fit, but this fit was entirely natural. She squealed in excitement at seeing you in it which made you @@.girlVoice;blush@@ in response. You still couldn't get used to the reactions of people gushing over how @@.girlVoice;cute you were@@. It always felt nice to hear, but it was a new experience. <<playerVoice "\"Thanks Emily, it's super cute, you have great taste.\"">> You still weren't quite sure how to handle this. Had Emily actually bought this for you? It looked expensive...and why now? @@.emilyVoice;"Anything for my favourite sister!"@@ She giggled, @@.emilyVoice;"let's go show mommy!"@@ She offered you her hand. You took it, as you so often had lately. Emily was such a force of nature that it was usually easier just to follow along. It might not go as she expected, but you could guarantee she'd always lead you into something fun. In a flash the two of you were downstairs. Mom was just sitting on the couch when Emily pushed you forward for inspection. @@.momVoice;"Very cute,"@@ she turned to Emily, @@.momVoice;"this was the new dress you bought for <<playerName>>'s first day?"@@ <<playerVoice "\"First day?\"">> @@.momVoice;"Your first day of school. Emily wanted to make sure you looked good. Now be careful not to get it messy, Emily spent all her allowance on it."@@ <<playerVoice "\"Wait. What? School? With Emily? What are you...\"">> Realization hit you like a truck, not only did Emily know, but mom did as well!? Had everyone worked out your decision before even you did? [[Emily giggled|Golden Ending Stay Young 4]]@@.emilyVoice;"You know <<playerName>>, sometimes you're really dumb."@@ @@.momVoice;"Be nice Emily,"@@ mom gently admonished, @@.momVoice;"this isn't an easy choice."@@ She turned to look at you, @@.momVoice;"don't worry too much sweetie. Mommy will take care of everything."@@ <<playerVoice "\"Wait, but I...I didn't even...\"">> you felt @@.girlVoice;tears building in your eyes@@. You'd been preparing yourself for a truly heart-wrenching situation. Concerned about what Emily would say. Or that mom would refuse. Or they'd both think you were some kind of freak for wanting this. Instead Emily's had been spending all her allowance on buying you a new dress and mom knew exactly what you wanted without making you utter a word. The tears burst forth, <<playerVoice "\"Mommy!\"">> You threw her into a hug, tears soaking her blouse. @@.momVoice;"Shhh, it's okay sweetie."@@ Her voice was so soothing. With confirmation that you could live this life you could almost feel your old life falling away. All those concerns and anxieties and complications were in the past now. You could just be a @@.girlVoice;little girl@@ and let mom handle all the complex adult stuff. [[Emily joined the hug|Golden Ending Stay Young 5]]You all stayed like that for a while before mom insisted that it was time for bed. You both had school in the morning. The stress of the day meant that you feel asleep instantly. But your dreams that night were @@.girlVoice;light and airy@@. You'd never dreamt much in the past, but now you dreamt of all sorts of fantastical things. @@.girlVoice;Unicorns and princesses@@. @@.girlVoice;Pet dragons and talking cats@@. When you felt yourself being dragged back into reality you resisted, wanting to stay in that @@.girlVoice;magical world@@. When you did finally open your eyes you were greeted with something almost as @@.girlVoice;fantastical@@. It seemed that mom had been doing some serious redecorating overnight. Your room was indistinguishable from the one you'd gone to bed in. It was the kind of room that other girls would kill to have. You had an honest to goodness @@.girlVoice;princess bed@@, with @@.girlVoice;lacy pink curtains@@ and everything. Your closet was slightly ajar and you could see all manner of @@.girlVoice;dresses and skirts and blouses@@ just waiting for you. Surrounding you on the bed were a dizzying array of @@.girlVoice;stuffed animals@@, with more scattered around the room. Your walls were covered in @@.girlVoice;butterflies and stars@@. In another lifetime you would have been disgusted by how over the top @@.girlVoice;pink and girly@@ the room was. You were a different person now. The only thing wrong with the room was that it was so perfect you might never want to leave. However, your excitement for your first day overwhelmed even that, hurriedly throwing on your @@.girlVoice;new favourite dress@@ and running downstairs. [[Your first day|Golden Ending Stay Young 6]]It turned out that mom really had handled everything to make sure your new life as a little girl started off smoothly. There were just a few little tweaks required. Not every trait you'd picked up at the sleepover was appropriate for real life. <<if $traitCatgirl>>\ <<set $traitCatgirl to false>>\ Your @@.girlVoice;cute@@ ears and tail were gone. You were a little disappointed, but it was necessary. You couldn't play them off as a @@.girlVoice;charming@@ costume when you were actually going to school....it'd be way too many questions. <</if>>\ <<if $playerAge !== $playerMaturity>>\ <<set $playerMaturity to $playerAge>>\ There was a small change to your mind. A small disharmony had been created between your physical and mental ages, which was bound to cause some distress. Now you had a normal $playerMaturity year old mind to go with your $playerAge year old body. <</if>>\ <<if $traitGRatedLanguage>>\ <<set $traitGRatedLanguage to false>>\ She'd removed your mental compulsion that'd left you unable to say @@.girlVoice;bad words@@. You still wouldn't say them of course, but now it was because you wanted to be a @@.girlVoice;good girl@@ and not that you ''had'' to be a @@.girlVoice;good girl@@. <</if>>\ <<if $traitBornToLose>>\ <<set $traitBornToLose to false>>\ You didn't know it but Emily had actually received quite a talking to about the curse she'd laid upon you. The one that had ensured you could never win at any game, no matter how hard you tried. She wasn't supposed to be using magic like that, and mom had removed it before it interfered with your life. <</if>>\ <<if $traitHonest>>\ <<set $traitHonest to false>>\ She was tempted to leave you with your compulsion to be honest, but decided against it. Yes she wanted you to always be honest with her, but it had to be your choice, otherwise it was meaningless. <</if>>\ <<if $traitHypnoSillyLittleGirl || $traitHypnoPrettyPrincess || $traitHypnoComplimentCurtsy>>\ She also saw fit to remove the post-hypnotic triggers that the girls had left in you, though they weren't really necessary anymore. <<if $traitHypnoPrettyPrincess>>Like every girl you still @@.girlVoice;wanted to be a princess@@. <</if>><<if $traitHypnoComplimentCurtsy>>You loved how it felt to @@.girlVoice;curtsy@@, you felt so @@.girlVoice;pretty@@ and @@.girlVoice;elegant@@. <</if>><<if $traitHypnoSillyLittleGirl>>Plus you were only $playerAge years old, so you were a @@.girlVoice;silly little girl@@ by default.<</if>> <<silently>>\ <<set $traitHypnoSillyLittleGirl to false>> <<set $traitHypnoPrettyPrincess to false>> <<set $traitHypnoComplimentCurtsy to false>> <</silently>>\ <</if>>\ Satisfied with her work there was one last change to make. She touched the necklace you still wore around your neck. There was the sound of a chime, a single pure note. Though it felt like it was coming from inside of you. @@.momVoice;"There,"@@ mom gave a gentle smile, @@.momVoice;"now it's just a pretty necklace for a pretty little girl."@@ Your eyes went wide in excitement. It was one last confirmation that this was your life now, that the wondrous choice you'd made would last forever. Mom pulled you in for a hug and you realized that, though she was trying to hide it, she was crying. @@.momVoice;"I'm so glad you found who you were."@@ When you were older she would explain to you about the reason for the sleepover, the curse, the trial, everything. But today was special and she didn't want to do anything to mar it, it could wait. The rest of the morning was a blur. You were so @@.girlVoice;hyper@@ that you would have forgotten your own head if it wasn't attached. Finally mom had gotten you properly dressed and prepared. Backpack packed, lunch made and ready to go. Emily of course walked you to school, the two of you endlessly ramping up each others excitement. Such was your level of emotion that even a nominally boring school day was a joy to you. No doubt the time would come where the sheen would wear off, but for now you'd do school seven days a week if you had to. [[The days went on|Golden Ending Stay Young 7]]The other girls were equally excited by the sudden turn of events. Emily had spoken to them about the possibility, she'd had a hunch about you, but they hadn't known you'd actually make the switch. Within minutes of the reveal plans had been formed for yet another sleepover, one properly welcoming you permanently into the group. This one mom was more than willing to host. It was a @@.girlVoice;a ton of fun@@. Half way through the day, you realized it was a near duplicate of that first sleepover. Though this time you didn't need any alterations to your mind or body to fit in. So when you were all in Emily's room for the latest dress up session you had no objection to @@.girlVoice;trying on everything@@ that was suggested. The final results were so exciting that you had to call mom in to get a picture. @@.momVoice;"Scoot in Sophie. You're part of this too."@@ Sophie grimaced, but moved in closer, making sure her lovely green dress was sitting properly. The rest of you quietly tittered at her. She was putting on a front, pretending that she was so above all this silly dressing up. But you all knew better, she was just as happy to be @@.girlVoice;dressed up as a princess@@ as the rest of you were. Either through magic or clever planning there was a dress prepared for each of you, in the right size and of your favourite @@.grilVoice;Disney Princess@@. @@.momVoice;"Now everyone say cheese!"@@ <<playerVoice "\"C">>@@.emilyVoice;h@@@@.sophieVoice;e@@@@.mikiVoice;e@@@@.karaVoice;s@@<<playerVoice "e\"">> Mom snapped the picture of the five @@.girlVoice;adorable little princesses@@, smiling wide without a care in the world, no matter how many teeth they were missing. You were right there in the middle, your sister on one side and Miki on the other. No one would ever guess that a few months ago you'd been a teenage boy who disdained the rest of them. To think one sleepover had started you down the path to looking and acting like you did now. Made over from a miserable mean teenage boy into a @@.girlVoice;cute little girl who couldn't be happier@@. Ending 1a: Sleepover Makeover <<include "Post Ending Choices">> <<saveEnding "all" 1>><<if $playerAge <= 6>>\ <<include "Vignette Ballet Class Young 1">> <<else>>\ <<include "Vignette Ballet Class Old 1">> <</if>>\@@.emilyVoice;"Are you ready sis?"@@ Emily looked down at you, still holding your hand. You were unsure. There was excitement but there was also trepidation. You'd never done ballet before, and now you were facing a whole class. Emily assured you that she would be there the whole time. Her class took place an hour after yours, so mom had dropped the two of you off together. Though apparently your class, 'Twinkle Toes', wasn't technically a proper ballet class, but 'pre-ballet'. <<playerVoice "\"I dunno...\"">> You were also feeling a little self concious. You'd never worn something quite this @@.girlVoice;girly@@ and considering your experiences that said a lot. @@.emilyVoice;"I told you, all the other girls will be dressed like that. This is just Twinkle Toes, it's for fun."@@ Emily pressed on undaunted. This didn't entirely remedy your feelings. Esepcially considering the difference in your and Emily's wardrobe. [[Look at your outfits|Vignette Ballet Class Young 2]]<div class="balletImageColumn">\ <<Image "Endings/GoldenEnding/Ballet/BalletLeotardYoung.webp">>\ <<Image "Endings/GoldenEnding/Ballet/BalletTightsYoung.webp">>\ <<Image "Endings/GoldenEnding/Ballet/BalletShoesYoung.webp">>\ </div>\ Emily was in what you might call a fairly 'classic' ballet outfit. A pink leotard with a modest skirt, white tights and cream colored shoes, even her hair was back in a bun. She looked so @@.girlVoice;pretty@@ and @@.girlVoice;elegant@@, but it was almost understated. It was a practice outfit, it wouldn't have the flourishes of a recital dress. On the other hand your outfit made most recital dresses look bland. You also had a @@.girlVoice;pink leotard@@, except yours had @@.girlVoice;sequins@@ spelling out "Ballet" on the front. Complete with a set of @@.girlVoice;shiny ballet shoes@@ and a @@.girlVoice;little bow@@ to tie them off. Instead of a normal skirt you had a proper @@.girlVoice;tutu@@. A bunch of @@.girlVoice;light ruffled layers@@ that @@.girlVoice;poofed@@ out all around you. Your tights matched, but in contrast to Emily's no nonsense set, yours had an @@.girlVoice;embroidered ballerina@@ around your ankle. The shoes continued the trend, pink, and came with an extra @@.girlVoice;pink pom pom@@ by the toe. Mom had even painted your nails @@.girlVoice;pink@@ to match. Everything about it was @@.girlVoice;pink@@ and @@.girlVoice;girly@@. This outfit, and by the extension the class, wasn't about practicing ballet, it was about making you feel like @@.girlVoice;ballerinas@@. Heck, even your bag had a tutu of it's own. Emily and your mom had gone all in on this one. If you were going to try ballet for the first time then they wanted to make sure you enjoyed it. <<if $playerMaturity >= 8>>You @@.girlVoice;loved it@@, even if it was a bit much. You kind of wanted to be in a class with Emily, but you were only $playerAge years old, so you were slotted into pre-ballet.<<else>>You @@.girlVoice;couldn't be more excited@@, you got to be a @@.girlVoice;ballerina!!!@@<</if>> [[Ready for class|Vignette Ballet Class Young 3]]It turned out that 'Twinkle Toes' wasn't actually the youngest class they hosted. When you arrived there were still a few @@.girlVoice;adorable@@ toddlers bouncing around the room. @@.emilyVoice;"This isn't really a ballet class,"@@ Emily explained, @@.emilyVoice;"they're just having fun."@@ The truth of Emily's words were obvious. There was no consistency to the outfits on display. Some were in full regalia like you, some had the tutu but no tights, and a couple were actually dressed much like Emily. You were a little embarrassed that there were @@.girlVoice;toddlers@@ who were dressed more grown up than you. Emily saw your discomfort, whispering to you, @@.emilyVoice;"I think they're cuter in their tutus, don't you?"@@ You did. Much @@.girlVoice;cuter@@. They were basically babies, no need to take things so seriously. Then again, the same outlook seemed to apply to your class as well, and you weren't a baby. [[Time to start|Vignette Ballet Class Young 4]]The 'Tiny Tots' class came to an end, the toddlers all moving through a final 'synchronized' sequence. It was a complete mess, some were even facing the wrong way in the end, but they were still @@.girlVoice;just so cute@@. Plus you'd never dare tease them, considering you might be in the same situation in a few minutes. So you, and the rest of the 'Twinkle Toes' class, stepped onto the floor. Emily was right there supporting you, but you were still nervous. Unlike with the toddler class there seemed to be two very distinct groups when it came to dress. There were a few girls in more formal training gear, while you and the others were in full regalia. This class went from ages 4-6 and most of those in @@.girlVoice;tutus@@ were in the 4-5 group, with the 6 years tending more mature. This only made you more nervous, it seemed like the older girls had at least some experience, while you were a complete newbie. You almost wished you were @@.girlVoice;younger@@ so there were less expectations. @@.teacherVoice;"Alright girls, gather round,"@@ spoke a tall @@.girlVoice;beautiful@@ woman. She was in an all black outfit, likely to make her easily visible and exuded a calm pleasantness that did wonders to soothe you. @@.teacherVoice;"We have a new girl joining us today as a trial, why don't you say hello <<playerName>>?"@@ You took back your commentary about being soothed, with everyone's eyes on you things had only gotten worse. [[Introduce yourself|Vignette Ballet Class Young 5]]You were being silly, you knew that. It was just a bunch of @@.girlVoice;little girls@@ like you. But it was a new activity, with new people, in a new place and it had all become terribly overwhelming. Nervously you fiddled with your @@.girlVoice;tutu@@, terribly self concious about how @@.girlVoice;childish@@ it was. <<if $traitChubby>>You were also keenly aware of how tightly it fit you. All the other girls were super skinny, while your stomach was obvious to anyone with eyes. Normally you could come to terms with that, but right now it was just another thing that weighed on your mind.<</if>> <<if $traitSoftspoken>>\ <span class="smallText"><<playerVoice "\"Hi, I'm <<playerName>>,\"">></span> you squeaked out. Though no one else could really hear you. <<else>>\ <<playerVoice "\"Hello, I'm <<playerName>>,\"">> you did your best to keep your voice steady despite your nervousness. <</if>>\ You needn't have worried, most of the other girls were overjoyed to have a new girl in their midsts<<if $traitSoftspoken>>, even if they hadn't heard your name<</if>>. Some of the 'serious' girls seemed annoyed about your inexperience, worrying it would slow down the whole class, but the rest were just having fun. They @@.girlVoice;loved@@ your outfit, and you @@.girlVoice;loved theirs@@ and everyone was just having a good time prancing around pretending to be @@.girlVoice;ballerinas@@. <<if $traitClumsy>>\ You were however, terrible at it, even by the standards of this group. You could keep up with the four year olds, but the rest were so much more @@.girlVoice;graceful@@ than you. It should have been mortifying, being so @@.girlVoice;clumsy@@, but you were having too much fun and everyone else was just so supportive. Maybe you shouldn't have been mentally teasing the toddlers for stumbling around, considering you were doing much the same. But even when you did trip it just made everyone, including you, @@.girlVoice;giggle uncontrollably@@. <<elseif $traitCatgirl>>\ You were actually a little more clumsy than you would have expected considering you were a @@.girlVoice;catgirl@@. Not that anyone else knew that. Mom had given you a little charm to hide that fact, keeping your ears and tails under wraps. Though if someone paid enough attention they might notice something odd about your eyes. However, you found yourself constantly off balance. Turned out your tail was more important than you'd realized. <</if>>\ At first the teacher was trying to keep the class somewhat calm, and focusing on the teachings of the day, but that was abandoned. If a gaggle of kindergarteners were having @@.girlVoice;too much fun@@ to focus there wasn't much to do but roll with it. So it became a light fun lesson to show the new girl the 'joys of ballet'. [[Class continued|Vignette Ballet Class Young 6]]<<if $traitSlowLearner>>Despite the light tone there were still enough instructions to make your head spin. It was fine, you just followed along with the other girls and didn't worry if you were a step behind the entire time.<<else>>You weren't sure how much you'd actually learn from today's class, but it was @@.girlVoice;lots of fun@@.<</if>> Even after class was done you and your new friends were chatting about how you //had// to come again next time. <<if $traitChatterbox>>You'd actually been @@.girlVoice;chatty@@ for the entire class, which the teacher had to keep gently admonishing you for. But you couldn't help yourself, there was just @@.girlVoice;so much to talk about@@.<</if>> So you talked with each of them until their @@.girlVoice;mommies@@ came to pick them up. It'd been so easy to just fall into these @@.girlVoice;silly, giggly@@ conversations about nothing at all. <<if $traitFashionista>>Though you'd never consider any conversation about different @@.girlVoice;tutu choices@@ to be unimportant.<</if>> Finally when you were the last one left the teacher came over to you. @@.teacherVoice;"Now, if you can keep quiet you can watch the next class. Can you do that for me?"@@ You nodded. Despite the fact you basically hadn't been silent since you'd arrived, you did really want to see Emily dance. So you covered your mouth to show the seriousness of resolve. Sitting down as Emily and the other girls prepared for their class. [[Watch Emily's class|Vignette Ballet Class Young 7]]Watching the girls in Emily's class you were struck by the difference in tone. They were only a few years older than you, but they seemed so @@.girlVoice;mature@@ and @@.girlVoice;refined@@. Gone were the @@.girlVoice;frilly tutus@@ and ornately patterned leotards. Simple leotards, cream tights and modest shoes. Some of the girls didn't have a skirt at all. Your @@.girlVoice;awe@@ only increased as the class started. Even in practice they all moved in sync, the precision of their movements stunned you. Your class hadn't been a ballet class, it was just prancing around, this was real ballet, and none were older than ten. How @@.girlVoice;amazing@@ would a teenager be? It was simple to keep your promise to be silent as you sat there with rapt attention. You would have sooner stopped breathing than make any sound that might interrupt their @@.girlVoice;beautiful dancing@@. When their class finally did finish you ran up to Emily, looking up at her with @@.girlVoice;undisguised awe@@. <<playerVoice "\"Can you teach me to do that?\"">> @@.emilyVoice;"Which part?"@@ <<playerVoice "\"All of it,\"">> you said gravely. [[Emily laughed|Vignette Ballet Class Young 8]]<<Image "Endings/GoldenEnding/Ballet/BalletBagYoung.webp" "smallTopRightCorner">>\ @@.emilyVoice;"That might take a bit sis," she tousled your hair, "but if you practice hard maybe you'll even catch up to me."@@ The two of you smiled at each other, aglow in sisterly affection. The two of you grabbed your bags, though yours was better, chatting while you waited for mom. When mom did finally come you up, the two of you were basically attached at the hip. Even when you got home, Emily spent the rest of the evening teaching you more of the basics. You talked about class and what else you could learn and when the recitals were. It was only at the end of the night that you came back down to Earth. Emily had to go to bed and you still had high school homework to do. You'd both been so excited that you'd forgotten that this state of affairs was only a temporary thing. With the day over you had to go back to @@.girlVoice;boring school@@ where you couldn't @@.girlVoice;wear a tutu@@ at all. It sucked, you wanted to do more ballet... [[Other memories|Golden Ending Vignettes][$balletVignetteViewed to true]]<<Image "Endings/GoldenEnding/Ballet/BalletShoesOld.webp" "smallTopRightCorner">>\ <<playerVoice "\"Are you sure these are right?\"">> You made another attempt at trying to correctly tie your ballet shoes. You'd seen ballet shoes with a simple strap, and those wouldn't be a problem. However, Emily had insisted that the ribbon would secure your foot much better. The fact they were so much @@.girlVoice;prettier@@ was supposedly just a side benefit. However you were stuck with a mess of ribbons that currently secured nothing at all. @@.emilyVoice;"Mmmhmmm, they work much better. Don't you trust your sister?"@@ //Right now? Not really.// You made another attempt at the ribbons only to end up with a knot you were struggling to get undone. Growling you sat back and glared at your sister. From the beginning she'd said that she'd help you do them up, you'd refused, and now you were stuck admitting your struggles. Rolling your eyes you stuck out your foot, accepting your defeat. Emily giggled and came over to help, tying them up in two swift movements that made it seem like it should have been trivial to do. Apparently this particular skill hadn't come along with the rest of mom's little 'ballet boost'. [[Before class|Vignette Ballet Class Old 2]]Since you were $playerAge years old there was a certain expectation of your skill level. The school had a 'pre-ballet', but it was meant for kindergartens. They apparently didn't offer 'basics' to anyone else. There were other schools of course, but you'd wanted to attend ballet with Emily, not at some different place across town. So mom had given you a little 'leg up', taking a copy of Emily's ballet skills and superimposing it upon you. It made you, generally, about as skilled as her. Though it seemed some ancillary skills like tying up your shoes hadn't made the jump. Emily had one major reservation about this strategy, that it was totally unfair. She'd worked for years to get this good and you just got it with a snap of a finger? However, her mother had managed to talk her down from the position. <<if $playerAge >= 9>>Firstly, despite the fact you were older, you were no better than her. Mom couldn't make a copy of skills Emily hadn't yet acquired.<<else>>Firstly, she still deserved full credit for your abilities. Without her you wouldn't be able to do much.<</if>> Secondly, if you wanted to keep those skills for more than a couple days you would have to start training your butt off. Ingraining this shallow imitation would be no trivial task. Third, as you'd noticed with the shoes, you didn't know //everything// Emily did, so she still got her chance to play mentor for her <<if $playerAge <= 8>>little<<else>>big<</if>> sister. [[Time for class|Vignette Ballet Class Old 3]]<div class="balletImageColumn"> <<Image "Endings/GoldenEnding/Ballet/BalletLeotardOld.webp" "smallTopRightCorner">> <<Image "Endings/GoldenEnding/Ballet/BalletTightsOld.webp" "smallTopRightCorner">> </div> With your shoes finally done up it was time to actually step onto the floor for your 'first' ballet lesson, though no one would ever believe that fact considering how skill you'd be. Or at least you hoped you'd be good. <<if $traitClumsy>>Despite the knowledge you'd been given it didn't change the fact you were a total @@.girlVoice;klutz@@<<elseif $playerAge <= 7>>Since you were younger than Emily you were a little less coordinated.<<elseif $playerAge >= 9>>You were actually a little older than Emily, but you weren't sure how much that would actually help.<</if>> Though you did have to wait until the @@.girlVoice;Twinkle Toes@@ class was done. This was the 'pre-ballet' class for a bunch of @@.girlVoice;adorable@@ little girls who'd never done it before. The oldest was no more than six and most of them were dressed up in the @@.girlVoice;frilliest pinkest@@ ballet outfits you'd ever seen. Your uniform was somewhat more sedate. You were dressed up for ballet, they were dressed up as @@.girlVoice;ballerinas@@. Which wasn't to say you didn't @@.girlVoice;love your outfit@@. It was @@.girlVoice;pink@@ and it had a @@.girlVoice;cute flowy@@ skirt that was //almost// a tutu without looking too immature. Your tights were a simple solid white, which others might think was boring, but you knew better. They weren't just tights, they were @@.girlVoice;''ballet tights''@@ which meant you were a @@.girlVoice;ballerina@@, even if you weren't as overt as the younger ones. <<if $traitFashionista>>You knew of course that this outfit was much more @@.girlVoice;fashionable@@ and @@.girlVoice;mature@@, but you really did @@.girlVoice;want to try on@@ one of those over the top ones eventually.<</if>> @@.emilyVoice;"Come on sis, time to go."@@ Emily offered you a hand. You took it and stepped onto the floor. <<if $traitDaydreamer>>Emily looked almost surprised at your level of sharpness. This was the kind of situation where you usually @@.girlVoice;drifted off@@ into some @@.girlVoice;daydream@@ or another. But there was no need for dreaming right now, this was a @@.girlVoice;dream come true@@.<</if>> [[Class begins|Vignette Ballet Class Old 4]]As class began you couldn't help but be a little self concious. Sure you looked exactly like a $playerAge year old girl, and there was no way anyone could know better, but it still gnawed at you. <<if $traitChubby>>It didn't help that the body you had //did// stand out in one way. All the other girls were so @@.girlVoice;pretty@@ and @@.girlVoice;thin@@, while you had an obvious @@.girlVoice;tummy@@. You couldn't hide anything in a leotard. You didn't think it would impede your abilities much, but you already felt awkward.<</if>> @@.teacherVoice;"Alright girls, gather round,"@@ spoke a tall @@.girlVoice;beautiful@@ woman. She was in an all black outfit, likely to make her easily visible. @@.teacherVoice;"We have a new girl joining us today as a trial, why don't you say hello <<playerName>>?"@@ The rest of the class turned to you, redoubling any uneasy feelings. But your sister was right there, casting you a comforting glance. <<if $traitSoftspoken>>\ <span class="smallText"><<playerVoice "\"Hi, I'm <<playerName>>,\"">></span> you squeaked out. Even with your sister's comfort you did have trouble raising your voice. <<else>>\ <<playerVoice "\"Hello, I'm <<playerName>>,\"">> you did your best to keep your voice steady despite your nervousness. <</if>>\ There was an odd diversity of reactions among the other girls. Some of them were just excited to have someone else join them, but others seemed more ambivalent about your presence. Though you had no opportunity to get close to them before lessons began. [[Follow along|Vignette Ballet Class Old 5]]What ensued were a series of stretches and poses that, until today, would have been completely alien to you. 'Plie', 'Port de bras', 'Adagio', and another dozen terms that sounded new to your ear, yet your body knew what to do. Which was good because some of the poses seemed //insane// at first blush. Trying to get your leg that high in the sixteen year old version of you would be both impossible and dislocate your hip in the attempt. Yet now it felt natural. You even had to bend down lower, leaving your leg on the bar in order to get a proper stretch. Clearly mom had given you some of Emily's physical prowess as well, because you doubted your average $playerAge year old could just naturally do this. But it felt so good. To be able to move your body this way. To bend and twist in ways that were almost @@.girlVoice;dreamlike@@. The experience was @@.girlVoice;magical@@. Despite your obvious experience making it seem like you'd done this hundreds of times, you were getting to feel it all for the first time. It was @@.girlVoice;intoxicating@@ and you understood why Emily loved it so much. It wasn't just that it @@.girlVoice;looked pretty@@, though it did, it was also how it made you feel. As the class progressed the other girls quickly warmed to you. It seemed the few with reservations were concerned that you had no experience at all, and were going to mess up their class. Now that you'd shown your prowess they all welcomed you with open arms. Though you had to admit, despite how much fun it was, it was a lot harder than you'd experienced. You had a newfound respect for the amount of effort Emily had put in. You'd thought of her as impatient and flaky, assuming ballet must have been easy to actually hold her attention. Apparently she had more perseverance than you'd realized. [[Class ended|Vignette Ballet Class Old 6]]<<Image "Endings/GoldenEnding/Ballet/BalletBagOld.webp" "smallTopRightCorner">>\ As class ended you were fatigued but satisfied. Rubbing your feet as you switched back into your outdoor shoes. In the end you weren't sure if Emily had been telling the truth about the shoes being 'better', but you hardly cared. You'd gotten to be a @@.girlVoice;ballerina@@, that was worth a little discomfort. You sat with your sister as you and the other girls waited for your parents to arrive for pick-up. Naturally you all chatted as you did, a flurry of names for you to remember. Emily's knowledge of ballet hadn't come with knowledge of her classmates, though it probably would have been suspicious if it did. <<if $bubblyTitle>>\ But you loved getting to know them all, they all felt like kindred spirits to you. Your entire group was @@.girlVoice;giggling@@ and @@.girlVoice;gossiping@@ the entire time until your mom finally arrived. The teacher actually had to tell you all to quiet down so you didn't interrupt the next class. In fact they weren't ready to let you go even when all your parents had arrived, @@.playerVoice5;"Oh you can't go!"@@ @@.playerVoice7;"You have to come with us."@@ @@.playerVoice6;"We're going to the mall."@@ <<if $traitShopaholic>>That was more than enough to convince you. You @@.girlVoice;loved the mall@@.<<else>>You were having @@.girlVoice;so much fun@@, you didn't want it to stop.<</if>> You gave your best @@.girlVoice;puppy dog eyes@@ to your mom, something you had gotten remarkably adept at. [[Mom agreed|Vignette Ballet Class Old 7 Bubbly]] <<else>>\ When mom finally did arrive you wished the other girls a farewell, giving them a vague answer in regards to your return. In truth you weren't sure, you wanted to do this again, of that there was no doubt, but the situation was complicated. If you came back again and again it would raise other questions, ones you didn't have good answers to. So despite the joy you had experienced there was a tinge of melancholy as you rode home. You actually felt a little jealous of Emily, that she was able to have this fun all the time. Maybe you could at least come back another couple times, surely that would be fine... [[Other memories|Golden Ending Vignettes][$balletVignetteViewed to true]] <</if>>\<<playerVoice "\"Yay!\"">> You @@.girlVoice;cheered@@ in unison with the rest of the girls before you all once again devolved into a @@.girlVoice;giggling mess@@. You understood why Emily got along with these girls, they were just like her. All @@.girlVoice;hyper@@ and @@.girlVoice;girly@@ and @@.girlVoice;giggly@@. Which is to say they were @@.girlVoice;just like you@@. What ensued was a day that was @@.girlVoice;boundless fun@@ for you and exhausting for the parents that had volunteered to chaperone you all. A bunch of @@.girlVoice;gradeschool girls@@ running around as if any time waiting was time wasted. There wasn't a single moment of silence. You had a @@.girlVoice;bunch of new friends@@ and you wanted to know everything about them, and they wanted to know everything about you. So you all @@.girlVoice;talked@@ and @@.girlVoice;laughed@@ and @@.girlVoice;shopped@@ for //hours//. When the other girls realized there were wardrobe pieces you lacked they were insistent on taking you to all the best stores with all the @@.girlVoice;cutest things@@. Luckily you had saved some money for just such an occasion. In truth most of your discretionary spending these days was on @@.girlVoice;clothes@@. Yes Emily had a closet you could borrow from, but you wanted to have a least some of your own things. <<if $traitShopaholic>>Though that //some// had turned into @@.girlVoice;a lot@@. You were basically broke all the time, but when you saw a @@.girlVoice;cute skirt@@ you couldn't help but want it.<</if>> You just had to remember to only buy them when you were in this form. A sixteen year old boy excitedly buying a unicorn covered pink dress in size $playerAge, tended to raise some eyebrows. You had so much fun that you crashed the moment you got into the car. Waking up in your bed with no recollection of how you'd got there, something Emily found very amusing. That you'd been so @@.girlVoice;overeager@@ that you'd literally collapsed the moment you sat down. @@.emilyVoice;"So you had fun then?"@@ Emily asked, obviously knowing the answer. You couldn't imagine having more fun than that, and your body clearly couldn't take it either. Now you just had to find a way to make sure you'd be able to do it again... [[Other memories|Golden Ending Vignettes][$balletVignetteViewed to true]]When Kara offered to take you to an anime convention <<if $traitOtaku>>you could @@.girlVoice;barely contain yourself.<<else>>you had some doubts.<</if>> You'd heard about them of course, even seen some on TV, but you'd never actually attended. It was one thing to see the crowds and costumes on a screen, another to have it all laid out before. It was something entirely different to experience it at <<print $heightArray[$playerAge - $traitShort + $traitTall]>>. Looking down at people dressed as monsters and demons made it cute, looking ''up'' was rather more intimidating. @@.karaMomVoice;"You alright sweetie?"@@ Kara's mom looked down at you. She'd agreed to be the chaperone for this little adventure which meant, at least for today, you had to do what she said. Plus she wasn't entirely up to speed on the situation, thinking you were just one of Emily's cousins. So you had to play a proper $playerAge year old girl. Not that you weren't more than used to that by now. @@.karaVoice;"She's fine. Just excited right?"@@ Kara interjected. Your other companion on today's journey was always a welcome sight. <<if $playerMaturity <= 8>>You had to admit she was more mature than you, and you looked to her for guidance.<<else>>You might be a little more mature than her, but she was always a source of calm.<</if>> So it wasn't a problem that today she was the only one to turn to. Emily and Sophie had declared it 'not their thing', which was code for 'too nerdy' and Miki had other family engagements. Which meant it was just you and Kara for today, with an entire con before you there was no time to sitting around, time to go. [[Enter the con|Vignette Anime Convention 2]]<<Image 'Endings/GoldenEnding/SailorFuku.webp' "smallTopRightCorner">>\ Your self conciousness spiked for a moment when you saw a boy from your class walk by you. Your heart froze, petrified that he would recognize you before he walked by without a second glance. Which, of course he did, how in the world would he ever recognize you when you looked like ''this''? With that little heart attack out of the way you were able to relax. You could have as much fun and be as silly as you wanted, no one<<Image 'Endings/SophieHigh/Leotard1.webp' "topRightCorner">>\ @@.sophieVoice;"Are you ready?"@@ Sophie asked as you stepped out onto the floor. <<playerVoice "\"I think so,\"">> but you couldn't keep the hesitation out of your voice. This situation was new to you and there were a lot of things to get used to all at once. <<if $selfConciousClothingCount >= 2>>\ At least your @@.girlVoice;leotard was cute@@. You'd spent plenty of time as a girl, in all sorts of outfits, so you'd gotten used to more 'revealing' clothes. As a male there would be no circumstance in which showing this much leg would be socially acceptable. But in this form, in this room, there was nothing unusual about it at all. <<else>>\ The first one being your current outfit. You'd spent plenty of time as a girl, in all sorts of outfits, but rarely anything with this much skin exposed. As a male there would be no circumstance in which showing this much leg would be socially acceptable. But in this form, in this room, there was nothing unusual about it at all. <</if>>\ Well, 'room', wasn't the right term. This was a gym, though it wasn't like any gym you'd ever worked out in. Instead of weights and machines, it was vaults and rings. There was so much equipment around, and you didn't have much idea of how to use any of it. After your little gymnastics competition at the sleepover you'd been curious about gymnastics in general. What Sophie was capable of when she wasn't just in a backyard? You'd thought you could go see her compete or something like that. Instead you were standing on the floor with her, barefoot and in your @@.girlVoice;own leotard@@. <<if $traitRapunzelHair>>Even your hair was pulled back into a ponytail. Your normally voluminous hair having been reduced to a more manageable level for the day.<</if>> @@.sophieVoice;"It'll be fine,"@@ Sophie did her best job to encourage you...to middling effect. Sophie had a brash confidence that you could never hope to match, so you had your own anxieties about the situation. [[Warm up|Vignette Gymnastics 2]]It became immediately clear how out of your depth you were, even during stretches. Since you were a <<convertNumberToText $playerAge>> year old girl, you were fairly flexible by default. You could touch your toes and all that, but Sophie was on a whole other level. She was currently on the floor bending her leg backwards all the way back to her head. This was followed up by a standing exercise where she was able to stand on one leg and hold the other leg straight up...not even just 'straight up', she was even bending it //back// a little bit. You'd been ready to brag about how you could almost sorta do the splits, but now you realized that was a bare minimum. <<if $traitChubby>>This did nothing to help your self conciousness. You were already painfully aware of how obvious your stomach was in this leotard. As far as you could tell no other girl in this whole gym had a pound of fat on them. Meanwhile you were shamefully displaying several.<</if>> <<if $traitCatgirl>>At least mom had hidden your @@.girlVoice;cat tail and ears@@ so you didn't have to worry about being even more of an outlier.<</if>> Even as Sophie finished running you through her warm up routine you knew this 'light' introduction was going to be pretty serious. [[Time to get started|Vignette Gymnastics 3]]You watched as Sophie hurled herself over the vault at a terrifying speed. She had kept it 'simple', with no twists or flips, but you still weren't sure you could manage the jump. <<if $playerAge <= 7>>It wasn't too surprising, you were younger than Sophie so you wouldn't be as capable as much.<<else>>The two of you were almost the same age, but her fitness level made you look pathetic.<</if>> The transformation you'd undergone at the sleepover had left you as, what you thought, was an 'almost average' little girl. With every moment you were revising that assessment down further. <<if $traitClumsy>>You bit your lip, maybe this whole thing had been a mistake. You were @@.girlVoice;clumsy@@ at the best of times, this seemed like a recipe for disaster.<</if>> Still you had to at least give it a try. Sophie had been nice enough to invite you, and was being as supportive as she could. So you made a run up...only to miss the timing and get basically no height off of the vault. Losing all forward momentum and just landing back on the vault itself. You felt like an idiot just standing there, motionless. Made worse because you could see a few other gymnasts watching your failure out of the corner of their eyes. @@.sophieVoice;"It's okay!"@@ Sophie offered, @@.sophieVoice;"here, let me show you again."@@ You let Sophie take another run at it. Doing your best to examine every part of her movements so that you'd be able to replicate something like it. <<if $traitForgetful || $traitClumsy || $traitChubby || $traitSlowLearner>>[[Continue to learn|Vignette Gymnastics Abandon 1]]<<else>>[[Continue to learn|Vignette Gymnastics 4]]<</if>>After a while you were able to make at least a little progress. You weren't about to start doing anything crazy, but you were able to make it over the vault. Once you'd even managed to 'stick the landing', or at least a close enough approximation of it. After a while longer Sophie declared that it was time to take a break. You sat off to the side, watching as another girl stepped up to practice. She was tiny, no more than six. Which made it all the more disheartening when she launched herself into a, to your eye, perfect twist and a perfect landing. Sophie noticed your attention, @@.sophieVoice;"she's quite good isn't she?"@@ There was genuine admiration in her voice, @@.sophieVoice;"but don't worry about it, she's been practising since she was two."@@ <<if $playerAge >= 8>>Two or not it was humbling to see a girl so many years your junior managing something like that.<<else>>That didn't do much to make you feel better, if that was the expectation for a @@.girlVoice;girl your age@@...<</if>> @@.sophieVoice;"Come on, let's go try something else."@@ [[More practice|Vignette Gymnastics 5]]For the remainder of the session you were aware that Sophie was taking great pains to keep things at your level. You appreciated the concern and it did help quite a bit. Things were still awkward and difficult at times, but at least you were able to succeed at a few of the moves. <<if $bubblyTitle>>\ A fact that you were @@.girlVoice;thrilled@@ by. You couldn't help but give yourself a little @@.girlVoice;cheer@@ when you managed to make your entire way across the beam without falling. Sophie smiled, but you got a glare from one of the other girls. This had been a growing trend through the day. Every time you got @@.girlVoice;excited@@ or @@.girlVoice;giggled@@ or really made any noise at all, you got nasty looks. Most of the glares came from girls older than you, making it more intimidating. Sophie tried to assuage your concerns, but it made you feel rather out of place. Everyone here was so serious. To you it didn't seem like any of them were having any fun at all. Like that little girl who'd done the flip, how was no one telling her how amazing she was? <<else>>\ One thing you were struck by as you continued was how quiet the gym actually was. You were used to the clank of metal. Weights hitting weights and an over-abundance of unnecessarily loud grunting. Sophie explained that, though the physical part of gymnastics was important, there was an artistic side as well. You had to make every move look @@.girlVoice;beautiful@@ and @@.girlVoice;effortless@@. Grunting like a caveman was anathema to that. So even during practice they tried to cultivate and @@.girlVoice;elegance@@. <<if $traitSoftspoken>>You wouldn't say you were @@.girlVoice;elegant@@, but you were good at @@.girlVoice;staying quiet@@.<<else>>Another thing that you were lagging grossly behind in.<</if>> <</if>>\ You wiped at your brow, panting. <<if $traitDainty>>Normally you wouldn't have done something this vigorous, but Sophie's energy was infectious.<</if>> You weren't sure how long you'd been at this, but fatigue was starting to catch up with you. Turned out children having infinite energy wasn't as absolute as they said. [[Training came to a close|Vignette Gymnastics 6]]@@.sophieVoice;"So how did you find it?"@@ You reflected on the matter, it had been a mixed bag. <<if $traitBarefoot>>It had been a lot of fun running and jumping around without having to wear heavy sneakers.<</if>> <<if $traitFashionista>>The @@.girlVoice;leotard@@ was @@.girlVoice;awfully cute@@<<if $traitShopaholic>>, you'd have to @@.girlVoice;buy one@@ for yourself<</if>>.<</if>> Learning all this was really interesting and you'd liked spending the time with Sophie, seeing something she was passionate about. On the other hand, being so awkward and clumsy the whole day had worn on your nerves. <<if $traitAfraidOfHeights>>Being that high in the air, even if it was only for a moment, was @@.girlVoice;pretty scary@@. Sophie told you that balance beam was the low one, but it felt awfully high to you.<</if>> <<if $traitFourEyes>>You'd lost your glasses more than once, the strap Kara had provided only doing half the job it promised to.<</if>> Plus you'd felt rather out of place, <<if $traitMonophobia>>you @@.girlVoice;hated@@ feeling like you weren't part of the group.<<else>>the other girls here had an intensity that was intimidating.<</if>> <<playerVoice "\"It was fun...but I don't know if it's for me.\"">> Sophie looked slightly disappointed but not surprised. @@.sophieVoice;"Well you're still invited any time. I could use the company,"@@ her smile was wry, @@.sophieVoice;"the other girls can be so stuffy, it's fun to have you around."@@ Her encouragement was enough that it made you really consider it. If you started training, //hard//, right now, maybe you actually could get yourself competent. Mom might even be willing to give you a little magical boost to help you on your way. So you nodded back to Sophie, you'd think about it for sure. <<if $selfConciousClothingCount >= 2>>But right now you'd feel most comfortable back outside, with Sophie being the only one teasing you.<<else>>But right now you'd feel most comfortable getting back into regular clothes and having something at least cover your thighs.<</if>> [[Other memories|Golden Ending Vignettes][$gymnasticsVingetteViewed to true]] <<set $selfConciousClothingCount++>>It did not go well. You just couldn't get your body to do what it needed to. But you preserved and kept trying...only to fail again...and again... One time you were able to almost do it right and you thought you'd made a breakthrough, but when you failed again you realized it had just been a fluke. You were never quite sure if it was because you @@.girlVoice;weren't coordinated enough@@, or you were just doing it wrong. Either way all you were doing was getting more and more frustrated with every failure. Sophie wasn't much help. Her instructions seemed to boil down to 'just do it' and that it should be natural. Eventually you'd had enough. After another tumble onto the mat your embarrassment had reached a peak. @@.girlVoice;Red faced@@ you stormed off. You didn't actually have anywhere specific to go. You just didn't want to do this anymore. Lacking a proper plan you found yourself at the wall. You sat against the wall, hugging your knees into your chest, head down. @@.sophieVoice;"<<playerName>>! Are you okay? Did you hurt yourself?"@@ Physically no, but your emotions were a wreck. <<if $traitCrybaby>>You practically @@.girlVoice;wailed@@ in response.<<else>>You were on the @@.girlVoice;verge of tears@@, you were just so frustrated and embarrassed.<</if>> @@.girlThought;This is so unfair. Why is Sophie making me do this?@@ [[Sophie sat beside you|Vignette Gymnastics Abandon 2]]@@.sophieVoice;"I'm sorry."@@ Sophie put her arm around you, @@.sophieVoice;"I'm not a very good teacher."@@ As mad as you were, the physical contact did make you feel a little better, and Sophie blaming herself took some of the pressure off of you. @@.sophieVoice;"Kara always says I'm bad at explaining things..."@@ You couldn't disagree. 'Natural' for her didn't mean 'natural' for anyone else, and she didn't seem to know how to explain those fundamental things. @@.sophieVoice;"Do you want to try again?"@@ You shook your head. You didn't want to ever do any of this ever again. You just @@.girlVoice;wanted to go home@@. Sophie stood, offering you a hand, @@.sophieVoice;"Let's get out of here."@@ @@.girlVoice;Sniffling@@ you took her hand and made your way to the changeroom. [[Outside the gym|Vignette Gymnastics Abandon 3]]Back outside in your normal clothes you felt a lot better. It was clear that you were never going to be a gymnast, and wearing a @@.girlVoice;leotard@@ was just reminding you of that fact. \ <<if $playerAge <= 7>>\ Sophie took your hand as you walked to a nearby convenience store. \ <<else>>\ You and Sophie made your way to a nearby convenience store. \ <</if>>\ You landed in front of a freezer stuffed with @@.girlVoice;delicious treats@@. @@.sophieVoice;"Pick whatever you want, my treat."@@ <<if $traitSweetTooth>>\ You had to resist the urge to say @@.girlVoice;''everything''@@. This freezer had dozens of @@.girlVoice;sweet treats@@ that you @@.girlVoice;loved@@. How were you supposed to pick? <</if>>\ After some deliberation you were able to come to a decision, pointing at a tempting rainbow popsicle. Sophie took one of her own, paying the clerk and leaving the store with you. As you sat outside, enjoying the popsicles and the sun, Sophie continued her apology. @@.sophieVoice;"I am sorry though, I just love it so much and I wanted to share that and I assumed you'd love it just like me."@@ You smiled at her, though your face was still a little red from your @@.girlVoice;sniffling@@. You didn't bear her any ill will. You didn't like gymnastics, but you still liked Sophie. She hadn't tried to make you feel bad on purpose, at least not this time. The two of you were still @@.girlVoice;best friends@@ and there were so many other things you could do together. [[Other memories|Golden Ending Vignettes][$gymnasticsVingetteViewed to true]]You'd actually went to theme parks a couple times, but there was one day in particular that stood out... @@.emilyVoice;"Come on! We have to hurry!"@@ <<if $traitEnergetic>>You and Emily rushed through the park, mom trying to get the two of you to slow down.<<else>>Emily tugged on your hand as she rushed through the park, mom trailing not far behind.<</if>> This trip was just the three of you, but that didn't mean the others didn't have their influence. You'd thought it'd be back on Emily's plan but mom had other ideas. [[More rides|Vignette Theme Park Sick 2]]Mom steered the three of you to some more sedate rides. First the carousel. Where mom rode with you, even though you were tall enough to do it on your own. Then onto another spinny ride, which worried you initially, but turned out to have a twist. The ride moved in a slow loop, only if you spun the disc in the middle did the car spin around. Emily was spinning wildly in her car, while you and mom just gently looped around. When the three of you did approach a proper roller coaster your mother claimed that she needed a break, and asked if you would keep her company while Emily went on the ride alone. <<if $playerMaturity <= 7>>Of course you agreed to stay with her.<<else>>You knew what she was doing, but appreciated the break.<</if>> The rest of the day proceeded much the same. Floating from quiet ride to quiet ride with mom 'taking a break' whenever you encountered something more intense. <<if $playerMaturity <= 8>>There was one ride that was denied to Emily, since she needed adult accompaniment, and mom didn't want to leave you alone.<<else>>Mom did leave you alone when one ride required Emily to have adult accompaniment, but by then you were feeling a lot better.<</if>> [[Heading home|Vignette Theme Park 5]]With a few more rides under your belts it was time to get home. Cotton candy sticks forgotten in hands, tongues still pink and blue. <<if $playerAge <= 8>>Emily claimed later that you'd fallen asleep first, and as the older sister she'd watched over you.<<else>>You claimed later that Emily had fallen asleep first, and as the older sister you'd watched over her.<</if>> Mom put the debate to rest by revealing you'd both fallen asleep at the same time, leaning into each other in the back seat. Something she declared @@.girlVoice;adorable@@ and even had the photographic evidence to back it up. 'Leverage' she claimed, to be used in the future. Either way the two of you were still wiped even after you'd gotten home, barely getting dinner in before trudging your way up to your rooms. Falling asleep fully clothed, too tired to even get undressed. It was the best theme park day ever. [[Other memories|Golden Ending Vignettes][$themeParkVignetteViewed to true]]<<if !$themeParkVignetteViewed>>[[Six Flags|Vignette Theme Park 1]]<</if>> <<if !$balletVignetteViewed>>[[Ballet class|Vignette Ballet Class 1]]<</if>> <<if !$gymnasticsVingetteViewed>>[[Gymnastics|Vignette Gymnastics 1]]<</if>> [[Back to reality|Golden Ending 9]] <<silently>>\ <<set $scaredyCatValue to $traitAfraidOfTheDark + $traitMonophobia + $traitAfraidOfHeights + $traitClaustrophobic>> <<if $scaredyCatValue >= 3>><<set $scaredyCatTitle to true>><</if>> <<if $traitEnergetic && $traitGiggly && $traitChatterbox>><<set $bubblyTitle to true>><</if>> <</silently>>\<<silently>>\ <<set $playerAge to 0.4>> <<set $playerMaturity to 14>> <<set $voiceClassOverride to 8>> <<set $hairLength to "short">> <<set $hairstyle to 6>> <</silently>>\ Your mother looked surprised. She'd never told you about what exact fate you were trying to avoid, but you had to know it was severe. It was almost brave to face an unknown punishment like that...and also terribly foolish. You winced as the magic took hold. It felt like your whole body was being squeezed. You knew you were shrinking down, but the rest of your senses were a confusing mash. You could feel and hear and smell things that didn't make sense. It was all too distressing to understand exactly what was happening. In the end it was too much for your poor brain, and you fell unconscious. ... When you finally awoke those strange feelings were gone, replaced with a new set. From the moment you opened your eyes everything felt wrong. You shifted in place to try and sit up...and weren't able to do it. Grunting you tried again. Still nothing. It wasn't sleep paralysis, the muscles just weren't firing properly. You tried to speak, <<playerVoice "\"whaaaasss.\"">> What in the world was that?!? Now your tongue wasn't working right either? You held up your hand in front of your face...or at least you held up //a// hand. What you were looking at wasn't yours, it was so small and chubby...but then why did it move at your command? Not that it was obeying very well. Your control over it was coarse, the fingers awkward and jerky. [[Oh! You're finally awake.|Nightmare Ending 3]]@@.emilyVoice;"Hey there sleepyhead. I thought you were going to sleep all day."@@ Emily's face peered down at you. Understanding slowly dawned on you. Turning your head to the left, though not without struggle, you saw a series of wooden bars. Looking down at yourself only confirmed what you had feared. You weren't wearing a shirt at all, leaving your chunky stomach bare to the world. Your bottom was covered, but you'd rather it wasn't. You didn't want to believe what you saw, you shifted in place trying to get away, but to no avail. All you managed to do was make your diaper crinkle underneath you. You looked like you were about to cry. @@.emilyVoice;"Such a grumpy baby,"@@ she reached down and pinched your chubby cheek, @@.emilyVoice;"Mommy said that since you acted like such a brat that you should look like one too"@@. <<playerVoice "\"Gahh gahhh\"">>, once again your words failed to form into anything coherent. @@.emilyVoice;"Silly <<playerName>>, babies can't talk."@@ @@.mikiVoice;"Is she awake now?"@@, Miki's face joined Emily's in peering down at you. Kara and Sophie weren't far behind. @@.karaVoice;"Awwww, she's so cute!"@@, Kara reached down and tickled your belly. Despite every part of your rational mind screaming not to, you couldn't help but give an @@.girlVoice;infantile giggle@@. The sound delighted the girls and this opened the floodgates. They all began to poke and pinch and tickle, drawing more @@.girlVoice;girlish giggles@@. Your attempted protests only coming out as @@.girlVoice;babyish burbles@@. Finally you broke down and just @@.girlVoice;started wailing@@. Emily leaned down and picked you up, @@.emilyVoice;"Shhhh, no need to cry baby sis,"@@ then she dropped her voice and whispered into your ear, @@.emilyVoice;"Mommy said she would turn you back if you were a good baby. So you better behave...unless you wanna stay in diapers for a loooooonnnggg time."@@ That was enough to shut you up. Emily put you back down and the girls continued their adorable assault. You just had to lie there and take it, trying to ignore the strange pressure that spiked every time someone poked your stomach. Fearing the worst you tried to hold it in, but nothing in your body seemed to respond to the command. You just prayed that mom would come and save you before this got worse... [[Endure the assault|Nightmare Ending 4]]<<contentWarning "Minor wetting.">> [[You'd had enough|Nightmare Ending Escape 1]] <<set $humiliation to 8>>\ <<changeMaturity "small" true>>\@@.momVoice;"Now now girls, don't harass <<playerName>> too much. We wouldn't want her to get cranky just after waking up."@@ @@.emilyVoice;"Yes mommy,"@@ Emily played at the perfect obedient daughter. Her and the other girls finally backed off from your still squirming form. But something felt wrong, you couldn't place it, but the pressure had entirely faded. Mom crinkled her nose, @@.momVoice;"You all head down and finish breakfast. I'll take care of <<playerName>>. I think someone is in need of a diaper change."@@ You felt your heart drop. That was impossible, there was no way you could have. Surely you would have noticed...but you hadn't been able to muster any resistance when you'd tried to hold it in... You thought you were going to cry again. Emily had made you so little that you'd lost your bladder control entirely. Something that was entirely expected of someone your age, but you //weren't// supposed to be this age. @@.momVoice;"Now now, don't cry,"@@ @@.girlVoice;mom@@ picked you up and a palpable wave of relief flooded through you. @@.girlThought;Mommy made everything feel better.@@ You tried to banish that thought from your mind, just because you looked like a baby didn't mean you had to think like one. You would never admit it, but the new diaper had made you a lot more comfortable. <<include "Nightmare Ending Crib Escape">> <<set $humiliation to 10>> <<changeMaturity "medium" true>>\ <<set $noWetting to false>>\@@.momVoice;"Now you stay here while mommy takes care of the other girls."@@ With that she walked out of the room, leaving you entirely alone. No doubt she already knew that anyway. @@.girlThought;Mommy was smart@@, it wouldn't be a punishment if you didn't want to be turned back. You lied there for what seemed like an eternity before you heard someone coming up the hall. You couldn't even get yourself turned around to see who it was and before you knew it you were being picked up. @@.momVoice;"Now be careful Emily."@@ @@.emilyVoice;"Yes mommy,"@@ Emily's voice came from right beside your ear. Revealing the fact that she was the one carrying you. You didn't like this. Emily was smaller and weaker, what if something happened? @@.girlThought;I want mommy to carry me.@@ You started wriggling to express your displeasure, but that's all you were capable of. Emily's grip held firm. At a distressing speed you found yourself being carried out of the room. Nervous for your life you held on as tightly as you could, which was little more than some weak flexing of your hands at Emily's shirt. A few more moments and you found yourself in the kitchen, though since Emily was carrying you over her shoulder you couldn't actually see what was coming. Trying to turn your head more than a few degrees and you'd lose grip and risk falling. Finally you were put down, giving you a chance to take in the situation. [[Survey the scene|Nightmare Ending 6]] <<changeMaturity "small" true>>\The rest of the girls were still sitting around in their pjs eating breakfast. Each of them kept casting glances at you and smiling, clearly amused at your infantile condition. Now that you'd settled down you were able to understand your situation. You were in a padded high chair. You weren't even sure where mom had gotten this, but trying to understand her magical capabilities was usually a lost cause. You shifted in place trying to get more comfortable only to realize that without the support of the headrest behind you couldn't even hold your head up properly. Your frustration continued to build at your helplessness, made all the worse by the fact the girls could see your every useless movement. @@.momVoice;"You have a baby brother, don't you Kara? Why don't you try feeding <<playerName>>?"@@ <<playerVoice "\"Baaaahhhh,\"">> was your best attempt at a protest. You didn't need help being fed, you could do it yourself...at least you wanted to believe that. It'd been clear from the trip with Emily that you wouldn't even be able to properly grip a utensil, let alone feed yourself with it. Your mother handed Kara a clear bottle of milk. You weren't sure if it would have been better or worse to have been old enough to have mushy food. On the one hand it meant that you weren't even old enough for solids, but on the other hand you weren't enthused by the idea of mushy prunes for breakfast. @@.karaVoice;"Open up,"@@ Kara ordered. You were tempted to defy her but your @@.girlVoice;tummy grumbled@@ and your @@.girlVoice;mouth opened automatically at the sight of the nipple@@. Latching on the moment that you felt it enter your mouth. The sensation of suckling combined with the rush of milk into your mouth was @@.girlVoice;shockingly soothing@@. All your frustrations and concerns faded away as you continued to feed. [[Suck suck|Nightmare Ending 7]] <<changeMaturity "medium" true>>\<<playerVoice "\"Whaaaa!!\"">> you reflexively cried as Kara tried to take the bottle away. It wasn't the most mature way of asking for more, but you were still hungry. Kara just giggled, @@.karaVoice;"Such a greedy baby."@@ She returned the nipple to your mouth. You would have denied it, or glared, or something, but you were too pleased with the fact you had your bottle back. Giving a @@.girlVoice;cute little burp@@ once you were actually satisfied with your meal. This drew a round of coos from the girls. This was the best they had liked you all weekend, it'd just taken making you helpless and unable to communicate. There was a fullness in your @@.girlVoice;tummy@@ that seemed to have an odd connection to your head. It felt heavy and slow. Tougher to get concerned with the situation, much easier to just go along with things. @@.momVoice;"Well I think it's time for you girls to get dressed. Your parents will be here soon."@@ The girls all groaned but moved to obey. Each of them making sure to poke at you one last time before they left the room. Sophie's poke to your @@.girlVoice;tummy@@ filled you with terror. You hoped all that milk hadn't hit your bladder yet. <<if !$noWetting>>You could do nothing else to do but hope. If it had your only indication was going to be a spreading warmth and an unpleasant smell.<</if>> Once they were all gone mom leaned down and wiped some milk off of your chin. @@.momVoice;"Looks like you were able to entertain the girls after all.
