Such a //brahh tee// baby."@@ [[There was a flash of light|Emily Low Happiness Event Aftermath]] <<set $emilyLowHappinessBegEmily to true>>\ <<set $emilyLowHappinessHadBreakdown to true>>\<<playerVoice "\"Oh no,\"">> you were out of time, you couldn't hold it any longer. <<if $playerPosition !== "floor">>You got yourself back onto the ground.<</if>> Maybe if you hurried you could still make it to the bathroom. @@.emilyVoice;"Is baby <<playerName>> about to make a mess?"@@ Emily cooed into your ear. The two of you had been going at it for weeks and even moreso today, now she had a chance to get some revenge. [[Baby need sissie...|PB Task Failure Repeat]] [[Stay silent|PB Task Failure Silent]]<<contentWarning "Wetting">> <<set $pbTaskFailure to true>>\ <<changeEmbarassment "medium">>\ <<set $showPBChecklist to false>>\<<set _currentPlayerName to ($girlName || $playerName)>>\ <<playerVoice "\"Baby _currentPlayerName need sissie help go potty.\"">> You spat out, as quickly as you could. Emily just giggled. She had her wand out, but she still wasn't doing anything. Why was she torturing you like this? You understood the lesson she was going for, that little sisters need help from their older siblings and withholding that help is cruel. You'd work on being nicer to her later, right now you were about to burst...if she waited any longer then you would... [[A flash|Emily Low Happiness Event Aftermath]] <<set $emilyLowHappinessBegEmily to true>>You weren't about to debase yourself to her like that. No way in hell you'd say it. She'd lord that one over you forever. An @@.girlVoice;accident@@ was going to be mortifying but you could blame your body's inadequacies. But saying something like that had no real excuse. Emily grimaced and threw up her hands. She'd given you so many opportunities to avoid this, it was on you now. As if at her signal your bladder finally @@.girlVoice;let go@@. There was @@.girlVoice;nothing you could do to stop it@@, you just @@.girlVoice;didn't have that kind of control@@. <<if $emilyLowHappinessDiaper>>\ It turned out that a @@.girlVoice;diaper@@ was an appropriate wardrobe choice for you in. You hadn't even realized what was happening until it was way too late. The spreading warmth was the first sign you noticed, signalling you'd failed at Emily's little game. You weren't sure if the diaper made the current situation more or less embarrassing. On the one hand, you were wearing a, now wet, diaper and that was fundamentally humiliating. On the other hand it had been absorbent enough that it hadn't made any further mess. You were currently in basically a @@.girlVoice;baby's@@ body, was this really unexpected? Though you couldn't see it, the flowers had disappeared from the front of the diaper. It's presence letting anyone who'd ever dealt with a baby know exactly what had happened. <<else>>\ It turned out that the training pants were a mercy. As embarrassing as it was for you to have an accident at your age, the extra absorbency did prevent things from getting even more harrowing. However, now you had to just stand there, the warmth spreading across your underwear, the blush on your cheeks getting deeper and deeper. You hadn't thought this far ahead...what did you do now? Surely Emily wouldn't leave you this way...but she did look awfully frustrated with you. <</if>>\ Emily wrinkled her nose and the other girls whispered amongst themselves. [[Feel your failures|PB Task Failure Silent 2]] <<changeEmbarassment "medium">>\ <<set $emilyLowHappinessHadAccident to true>>\Emily was annoyed enough that she was willing to let you deal with the consequences of your failures a little bit longer. She'd transformed you into a toddler because she was fed up with your behaviour and wanted you to learn a lesson. She wanted to to know how frustrating and helpless you could feel when you were little, and how much you'd need to rely on your older sibling. Now you were getting a //very// keen lesson on that fact. Emily would have done almost the entire task for you, if you'd asked. She even would have turned you back to normal before this happened if you said one little silly phrase. Instead you had to be stubborn, so she wanted to make sure the lesson was driven home. So you had to stand there <<if $emilyLowHappinessDiaper>>in an increasingly uncomfortable wet diaper.<<else>>in increasingly uncomfortable wet undies<</if>>. Emily had her arms folded across her chest, @@.emilyVoice;"See? You're just a helpless little baby,"@@ her words dripped with derision. You'd have to say it like a @@.girlVoice;baby@@ <<if $emilyLowHappinessDiaper>>who needed diaper change.<<else>>who'd had an accident.<</if>> [[Ask to be changed|PB Task Failure Silent 3][$emilyLowHappinessPostAccidentBeg to true]] [[Stay silent|PB Task Failure Silent 3][$emilyLowHappinessPostAccidentBeg to false]] <<changeEmbarassment "medium">>\<<if $emilyLowHappinessPostAccidentBeg>>\ <<playerVoice "\"Baby <<playerName>> needs a change.\"">> She hadn't specifically said you needed to do the 'baby' thing, but it might soothe her fury a little bit. There was a blinding flash of light. <<else>>\ You folded your arms back at her. Turning your head away from her with a <<playerVoice "\"humph.\"">> You still weren't going to give her the satisfaction. She looked like she was about to strangle you. Her wand lifted, pointing at you, a dark look crossing her eyes. But before she could do anything there was a blinding flash of light. <</if>>\ ... By the time you could see again you were back in your pre-toddler body, in your normal outfit, with normal underwear. <<if $emilyLowHappinessPostAccidentBeg>>\ @@.emilyVoice;"Well I hope you've learned your lesson."@@ Emily didn't look exactly happy at the moment, but she at least looked satisfied. No way you'd gotten through that and hadn't at least understood her intent. <<else>>\ Emily still looked furious, @@.emilyVoice;"darn it,"@@ she grumbled, @@.emilyVoice;"magic was 'pposed to last longer."@@ You'd dodged a bullet there. The magic having 'timed out' before Emily could do something to make it even worse. <</if>>\ With that Emily walked back to join the other girls. As annoyed as she was it was clear that your behaviour hadn't endeared you to the others either. Seeing you that way was just kinda gross. As cute as a toddler was in the abstract, they didn't want to deal with any of the yucky realities that came with it. You still felt shaken from the experience. You felt mostly restored, but some of the feelings were hanging on. How @@.girlVoice;small@@ and @@.girlVoice;helpless@@ you'd been. That @@.girlVoice;weakness@@ still suffused your body, but no choice but to get back to the party...after a quick bathroom trip. The experience had made you keenly aware of the urgent feelings from your bladder. You were sure it would be fine, you'd just take a few extra trips to the toilet, it'd be fine...probably. [[Back to the party|Event Handler]] <<include "Emily Low Happiness Event Reset Age">> <<silently>>\ <<addTrait "$traitWeakBladder" "Weak Bladder" "trait">>\ <<changeAge "small">>\ <<changeHappiness "Miki" false>> <<changeHappiness "Kara" false>> <<changeHappiness "Sophie" false>> <</silently>>\Kara tensed as she saw you approaching, but continued her discussion with Miki. @@.karaVoice;"The transformation of a caterpillar into a butterfly is called metamorphosis."@@ Kara lectured to Miki, @@.karaVoice;"can you say metamorphosis?"@@ @@.mikiVoice;"Meta-morphis,"@@ Miki struggled through the unfamiliar word. @@.karaVoice;"You're close, but its met-a-mor-ph-i-sis."@@ Kara spoke patronizingly slowly, over-enunciating every syllable to a painful degree. She also cast an eye in your direction, to see what you were going to do. @@.mikiVoice;"Met-a-mo-ph-i-sis."@@ @@.karaVoice;"'mor' not 'mo', it has an 'r' there."@@ This was painful to watch. Another example of Kara just having to be the smartest person in the room and not letting any little mistake go. [[Call Kara a know-it-all|Kara Low Happiness Event 2]] [[Let it go|Kara Low Happiness Event Reject]] <<set $karaLowHappinessEvent to 1>>\You and Kara weren't the best of friends, but this one wasn't worth the trouble. So you just nodded slightly in agreement, Kara's correction was at least correct. If Kara wanted to be a know-it-all who was compelled to correct people every time they did something wrong, that was her prerogative. If all the other girls hated her for it, that wasn't your problem either. Miki would get sick and tired of being corrected eventually and you didn't have to insert yourself into the situation and cause more friction. @@.mikiVoice;"Thank you Kara!"@@ Miki smiled brightly. @@.karaVoice;"Any time."@@ Kara responded. Neither of them had realized the dialog going on in your head, and how much Miki's response had shattered it. Seemed like Miki had been the one to ask for the lesson in the first place, and had been happy to receive it. Kara was just relieved that you hadn't caused any problems. //Huh, glad I didn't say anything. That could have gone badly.// [[Back to the party|Event Handler]] <<set $karaHappiness to 1>>\<<if $traitGRatedLanguageToddler>>\ <<playerVoice "\"Gosh, why are you always such a...\"">> Your brain hitched, you were about to say some @@.girlVoice;mean words@@ and you weren't allowed to do that. <<playerVoice "\"such a...person who knows everything.\"">> That wasn't really an insult as much as a compliment, but it seemed to get the point across. <<else>>\ <<playerVoice "\"God, why are you always such a know it all?\"">> <</if>>\ @@.karaVoice;"What?"@@ <<playerVoice "\"You could have just let it go, she was close enough, but noooo you had to show how smart you were.\"">> <<if $karaInferiorityComplex>>You knew she //was// super smart, but she was still being obnoxious about it.<</if>> @@.karaVoice;"But I-"@@ Miki looked between the two of you, confused at the sudden outbreak of tensions. <<if $karaInferiorityComplex >= 3>>\ You wanted to accuse her of being arrogant, thinking she was smarter than everyone else, except she //was// smarter than everyone else. So it wasn't really arrogance was it? But it was still annoying. <<playerVoice "\"You might be smarter than everyone else, but you shouldn't rub it in.\"">> <<else>>\ <<playerVoice "\"You what? You think you're smarter than everyone else? You think a //seven// year old really knows //anything//?\"">> <<if $playerMaturity <= 7>>The fact that your own brain wasn't any older didn't make her behavior any less annoying.<<elseif $playerAge <= 7>>The fact that you looked seven didn't take the bite out of your words, it was about the brain, not the body.<</if>> <</if>>\ [[Miki shouted|Kara Low Happiness Event 3]]@@.mikiVoice;"Stop being mean!"@@ Miki shouted in your direction, balling her little fists. The other girls hurried into the room, roused by Miki's shout, @@.sophieVoice;"what's going on here?"@@ Sophie looked between the three of you, your smug look, Miki's annoyance and Kara's crestfallen face. Emily and Sophie both turned to you, quickly identifying you as the culprit. @@.sophieVoice;"What did you do?"@@ Before you could answer Miki interjected, @@.mikiVoice;"<<playerName>> said Kara was dumb!"@@ <<if $karaInferiorityComplex >= 3>>\ <<playerVoice "\"No no I was just saying she acts //too// smart.\"">> @@.sophieVoice;"So you're saying she's a know it all?"@@ You gave a nervous nod. <<else>>\ That wasn't strictly true, but close it was enough, you shrugged your shoulders in admission. @@.sophieVoice;"And you think you're so smart?"@@ Sophie sneered at you. <<if $karaInferiorityComplex >= 2 || $playerMaturity <= 9>>\ You knew Kara was @@.girlVoice;way smarter@@ than you, but that didn't mean you were dumb. [[Back to the party|Event Handler]] <<silently>>\ <<if $playerAge <= 10>><<set _complexName to "Kara Fangirl">><<else>><<set _complexName to "Kara Fanboy">><</if>> <<addTrait $karaInferiorityComplex _complexName>>\ <<set $karaInferiorityComplex to 3>>\ <</silently>>\You knew Emily would make good on her threats, you'd seen enough of that in the past, let alone at this party. [[Back to the party|Event Handler]] <<set $karaInferiorityComplex to 0>>\ <<changeEmbarassment "medium decrease">>\@@.emilyVoice;"Kara will get one prize for every round she won, plus another prize for each penalty."@@ Miki went to the prize white board and removed the bottom piece of paper. const disneyPrincessList = State.variables.disneyPrincessList; const lowerDisneyPrincessList = disneyPrincessList.map(x => x.toLowerCase()); let wrongAnswers = []; let rightAnswers = []; let correctAnswers = 0; let neededAnswers = 0; let attemptedAnswers = 0; switch (State.variables.klQ1Difficulty) { case 1: neededAnswers = 6; break; case 2: neededAnswers = 10; break; default: neededAnswers = 13; break; } answers.forEach(function (answer) { let formattedAnswer = answer.trim(); She'd never seen anyone be that fast, let alone someone who had never played the game before. <<if $karaInferiorityComplex>>Any doubts you'd had about being able to match up to Kara were washed away in an instant. Time for the last event then."@@ Emily's voice held the same stunned disbelief that Kara's face did. The whole thing made you feel invincible. [[Event 3|Kara Low Happiness Event Quiz 3-1]] <<changeEmbarassment "small decrease">>\ <<set $klRound2Result to 3>>\ <</if>>\<<include "Valid Set 1">> @@.karaVoice;"So let's begin with the first valid set we started with, okay?"@@ @@.karaVoice;"If you look at these three cards you'll see they're different on all four features. All different colors, all different shapes, all different shades and all different numbers."@@ Her words were slow and measured, making sure you understood each point before moving to the next. @@.karaVoice;"So if we switch this card..."@@ ... What ensused was a very thorough and patient explaination of how Set worked. In theory it was a fairly simple game, there were only a handful of rules, but the main mechanic was mind bending. Instantly after showing three new cards Kara would know if it was a valid set. @@.girlThought;How can she just see them like that?@@ It was frustrating. The more she explained it, the more confused you seemed to get. It wasn't that her teaching was bad, far from it. With each new trio she carefully explained why it was or wasn't a set. Her explaination made sense, you understood the reasoning. Then she put out a new trio and asked you to give her the reasoning and it all fell apart. [[Still learning Set|Kara Low Happiness Event Games Set Slow Learner 2]]The entire time she taught, Kara had a smile on her face, which initially confused you. Kara and you //hated// each other, you both wanted to avoid interacting with each other. You were forced into this, a few gestures from Emily confirming this lesson was //not// optional, but why would Kara be enjoy herself? @@.karaVoice;"Now you have to pay attention <<playerName>>, otherwise you'll never learn."@@ She wagged a finger at you. Understanding hit you. Not about Set, that was still a mystery, but about Kara's intentions. This lesson was her teasing you. Watching you struggle and fail to do something she could easily do. Having justification to treat you <<if $playerMaturity <= 9>>even more like a @@.girlVoice;little kid@@.<<else>>like a @@.girlVoice;little kid@@.<</if>> Getting to rub in your face with every new instruction how much smarter than you she was. This realization just made the rest of the lesson even more painful. Every new failure pricking at your deflated ego. Every painfully slow instruction making you feel stupid for needing it. Even if you did manage to succeed Kara's excited, @@.karaVoice;"that's right! Very good."@@ Made you feel like she was teaching her @@.girlVoice;toddler@@ brother. Despite your best efforts to end this nightmare it was clear you @@.girlVoice;weren't getting anywhere@@. The information just @@.girlVoice;refused to stick@@ in your head. You were too much of a dumbass to learn it properly, not that Kara would ever say that. Not out of kindness mind you, she just wouldn't insult someone that directly. All she needed to do was patiently explain something //again// and you'd feel like an idiot all on your own. It was a mercy when she finally stopped the lesson, bored of teasing you. Time to move to the last event. [[Event 3|Kara Low Happiness Event Quiz 3-1]] <<changeEmbarassment "large">>\ <<addTrait "$traitSlowLearner" "Slow Learner" "trait">>\@@.header;Sleepover Makeover@@ Version: 0.12.1 Disclaimers: This game involves child characters and regression into childhood. The PG rating is strictly for bad language, there is no sexual content. Any content outside of a "normal" TG/AR will be marked with a <<hovertip "CW: Scary spooky skeletons">>🐉<</hovertip>>. This warning can be disabled in Settings. If you see a <<hovertip "Hello, dragonfire here. Thank you for playing.">>🐉<</hovertip>> anywhere else you can hover it for some meta notes. Please report any bugs/suggestions/ideas/complaints/comments to the discussion thread. I'd love to hear from you. [[Credits|Credits]] [[See the Intro|Opening Passage]] <<link "Skip the Intro" "Activity Selection">> <<set $showJournal to true>>\ <<set $showReportCard to true>>\ <<set $showActivityList to true>>\ <<set $inventoryHasJournal to true>>\ <<set $showNPCInfo to true>>\ <</link>>\<<playerVoice "\"You can't be serious. You're not back until tomorrow?\"">> @@.momVoice;"Very serious, something important came up and it simply cannot wait until tomorrow."@@ <<playerVoice "\"But-\"">> @@.momVoice;"No buts mister, with the way you've been acting lately you're lucky that this is all you have to do."@@ <<playerVoice "\"You can't blame me for that. Emily has been such a pain.\"">> Your mother sighed, @@.momVoice;"You forget how similar you were at that age. Emily is eight, you're going to have to be patient. You're going to have to be patient with all of them."@@ She fixed you with a look that solidified that this wasn't a debate. @@.momVoice;"You're going to keep the girls company for the night and make sure that they have fun. When I return I expect them to tell me you were a delight and made the sleepover a huge success."@@ <<playerVoice "\"Do I really have to be here the whole night? Watching a bunch of stupid little girls?\"">> @@.momVoice;"The whole night, you'd better not leave them alone."@@ She checked her watch and clicked her tongue, @@.momVoice;"I must go, or I'm going to be late. You behave yourself, I've given your sister a wand just in case you won't play along. Have fun."@@ [[A wand...|Opening Passage 2]]Fantastic, so your sister was going to have unknown magic on her side. It was probably worth noting at this point that your mother was a witch, and you meant that in a very literal sense. You didn't have all the details, but you'd seen her do enough that you couldn't possibly doubt it. Physical transformations into animals, closets that made everything fit, teleportation, mental manipulations making you talk like a baby. She said there were limitations, but to you it seemed almost limitless. Apparently your sister had the gift as well, but you didn't know where she sat in that power scale. Last time she'd demonstrated those powers you'd ended up with rabbit ears and an irresistible craving for carrots. With a wand empowered by your mother she might be capable of a lot more. You on the other hand didn't have any talent for it at all, and nor would you ever. Apparently magic was a 'no boys allowed' kind of thing. Which meant you were going to have no way of defending yourself from...whatever your mom and her had planned. Great. An entire night spent watching over a gaggle of annoying little girls, without being allowed to leave. Bad enough if it didn't also come with a doubly annoying sister armed with a magic wand. [[Demand an explanation|Opening Passage 3]]@@.momVoice;"Don't worry, you won't have to do anything too strenuous. Almost everything has been taken care of. All of the activities are planned, snacks are ready and dinner has been ordered."@@ It wasn't the workload that annoyed you, it was the fact you were getting stuck with a bunch of annoying giggly girls. Your sister was //probably// the worst, but the rest would just amplify her annoyances. She turned again to leave, @@.momVoice;"if anything serious happens Emily knows how to signal me with her wand and you know my number."@@ It was a stronger statement than it appeared. You knew your mother could literally be back at a moment's notice, you'd seen her teleport across town before. Though apparently she could only come back to the house. So she'd still have to abandon...whatever it was she was doing. Best to avoid it, but at least you had a safety net. She gave a small smile, @@.momVoice;"just let yourself relax and have some fun. Maybe you'll find yourself enjoying it more than you expect."@@ You weren't sure how you could ever have fun at a bunch of childish games, but your mother seemed oddly confident. @@.momVoice;"You will try to enjoy yourself won't you?"@@ [[Reluctantly agree|Opening Passage 4][$openingAgreementLevel to 1]] [[Aggressively disagree|Opening Passage Disagree][$openingAgreementLevel to 2]]@@.momVoice;"This isn't a request."@@ Your mother scowled at you. @@.momVoice;"As the eldest it is your responsibility to take care of your sister when I'm not available."@@ <<playerVoice "\"This isn't just taking care-\"">> @@.momVoice;"You //will// take care of them. Any magic your sister uses can easily be reversed once I'm back. It's only one night."@@ [[Capitulate|Opening Passage 4]] [[Absolutely refuse|Opening Game End]]<<playerVoice "\"Not a chance. Emily is a brat and it's ridiculous that you're making me take care of her.\"">> <<playerVoice "\"You gave her a goddamn magic wand, you're basically //telling// her to mess with me.\"">> Your mother stayed silent as you continued your lecture. <<playerVoice "\"She's going to turn me into a rabbit or a baby or some random shit and then what? How am I supposed to take care of them when that happens?\"">> @@.momVoice;"Well you don't really need to take care of much."@@ <<playerVoice "\"That is so not the point...if you want an empowered bratty child witch, then //you// can deal with the consequences.\"">> With that you walked out the door yourself, leaving a shocked mom in your wake. You tensed, waiting for the consequences of your actions. Yet nothing seemed to occur. Perhaps you'd shocked her enough that you'd gotten away with it, or maybe she was impressed enough that you'd stood up to her that she let you off with it. Either way you weren't sticking around. Hurrying away until you were out of eyeshot before breathing a sigh of relief. No doubt you were going to feel the consequences of this eventually, but for today you needed somewhere to crash. Billy's house wasn't far, and he'd probably let you stay the night. You laughed to yourself, seemed like you'd be spending the night at a sleepover after all, but this one would be mundane. No magic, no transformations, no insane witch of a mother or bratty witch of a sister. It sounded like heaven. Ending 0: Over Before It Began <<include "Post Ending Choices">> <<saveEnding "" 26>><<switch $openingAgreementLevel>>\ <<case 1>>\ <<playerVoice "\"I'll try...\"">> You grumbled. You weren't super excited about the idea, but you also didn't want to piss of your mother before this even started. <<case 2>>\ <<playerVoice "\"Fine.\"">> You snapped. You hated this idea, and knew your sister would make it miserable, but you didn't seem to have a lot of choice. You'd just have to hope they wouldn't spend the whole time tormenting you. <<silently>>\ <<set $emilyHappiness to 1>> <<set $mikiHappiness to 3>> <<set $sophieHappiness to 2>> <<set $karaHappiness to 3>> <</silently>>\ <</switch>>\ Your mother nodded and waved you goodbye. You were left alone with the girls, currently congregating in the living room. @@.karaVoice;"Is your brother really going to be here all night?"@@ @@.emilyVoice;"Yup, mommy put him in charge since she had to go out."@@ @@.sophieVoice;"Didn't you say your brother was super annoying?"@@ @@.emilyVoice;"Suuuppperr annoying. But mommy did give me this,"@@ Emily brandished the magic wand, @@.emilyVoice;"so he's going to have to play nice."@@ @@.mikiVoice;"I wanna play now!"@@ You looked grimly at the quartet of girls before you, your charges until tomorrow morning. You'd met them all before, so you had some sense of what you were dealing with. Though to help your mom had provided you with a minor magical item of your own. You fiddled with the mood ring on your finger, the gem in the center glowing different colors as you pointed it to each girl in turn. It let you know approximately how each of them felt about you. So you already knew that Sophie and Emily hated you, while Miki and Kara had no strong feelings. [[Look at the girls|Opening Passage 5]] <<silently>>\ <<set $maxEmilyHappiness to $emilyHappiness>> <<set $maxKaraHappiness to $karaHappiness>> <<set $maxSophieHappiness to $sophieHappiness>> <<set $maxMikiHappiness to $mikiHappiness>> <</silently>>\@@.karaVoice;Kara@@ was in the same class as your sister, despite being a year younger. It was a 2/3 split but she was clever enough that she spent basically all her time doing grade 3 work. Her long mousy brown hair looked a little dishevelled and somehow her glasses had been knocked askew. But she didn't seem to mind any of that. @@.sophieVoice;Sophie@@ was the oldest of the girls. As such, she'd taken on a bit of an older sister role. Curly red hair framed a freckled face that seemed to have a permanent dirt smudge. It wouldn't be right to call her a tomboy, but she was a little more rough and tumble than the rest. She was also surprisingly physically capable for her age, though at nine it wasn't a high bar. @@.mikiVoice;Miki@@ was, by contrast, the youngest of the girls. She was the younger sister of a boy from Emily's class. Apparently they'd hit it off far better than Emily and the boy. Her black hair was pulled into two loose pigtails that bounced whenever she moved. As far as you'd seen she was pretty shy, but certain things could get her very excited. @@.emilyVoice;Emily@@, your sister, was the most vocal of the group. Which meant that a lot of their plans ended up coming from her. You found her massively annoying, it felt like half the time she was acting more like a toddler than an eight year old. Her wavy blond hair and rosy cheeks gave her just the perfect look to get away with murder. She knew this, and she used it. You couldn't count the number of times her annoying giggle had gotten her out of trouble. [[Approach the group|Opening Passage 6]] <<set $showNPCInfo to true>>\The group turned to you as you approached. It was clear they'd already been briefed on the situation so there was no reason to belabour that point. <<playerVoice "\"So I'll be over on the couch watching TV. You all behave yourself and if you desperately need something you know where I am.\"">> Mom had said you needed to 'keep them company', you could tolerate that. You were less enthused by the idea of playing along with them. So you'd avoid it if you could. @@.emilyVoice;"Mommy said you would play with us..."@@ Emily seemed disappointed by your words. Idly she toyed with the wand. A nervous tick or a reminder of the power she had? You couldn't say. She perked back up quickly, @@.emilyVoice;"but since I'm super nice I'll even let you pick what we do. Mommy left a list. It's in here."@@ Emily handed you a leather bound journal. Opening it showed the list that Emily had referred to. Apparently your mother hadn't been kidding about preparing things. A glance at the list showed a litany of @@.girlVoice;childish@@ and @@.girlVoice;girly@@ activities. Perhaps some were tolerable, but others looked deeply unpleasant. Still, you'd have to at least pick something for them to do, whether you participated or not. [[There was more|Opening Passage 7]] <<set $showActivityList to true>>\ <<set $inventoryHasJournal to true>>\After the list there were a number of blank lined pages, clearly meant to act as a journal. You took a moment to jot down a few of your initial thoughts. Keep yourself a little 'apocalypse log' so you'd be able to make sense of everything that was about to happen. You didn't know exactly what Emily had planned, but she had a wand, so you doubted you'd come out of things unscathed. Maybe this time you'd at least avoid getting turned into a rabbit. The end of the book had a number of blank pages which felt like they were just waiting for content. Perhaps you'd find some things to fill them as time went on. You were about to close the book when you noticed one of those 'blank' pages had something on it. //My report card?// It was an extremely strange thing to find in a journal, but right now it looked normal enough. You'd have to keep an eye on it, as well as for anything else showing up. But before anything else could happen you were going to need to pick an activity. [[Choose an Activity|Activity Selection]] <<set $showJournal to true>>\ <<set $showReportCard to true>>\<<script>> if (!tags().includes('nofilter')) { window.filterText(); } <</script>>You were taking a moment to loiter between activities, considering the current situation. If the idea was to have you fit into the party then surely they wouldn't make you too young, right? A toddler wouldn't fit in. But that didn't mean you'd be okay with turning into a toddler.<</if>> You were going to have to fight to remain in the form you wanted. Although...you took a look at your arms...maybe 'fight' wasn't the right word. Any muscles you'd once had were entirely gone now. Until now you'd at least been holding onto a vestige of them, it at least looked like your arms could lift something. Now they were @@.girlVoice;delicate@@ little twigs. The skin was so @@.girlVoice;smooth and soft@@ it looked like you'd never done any labour in your life. A fact that Sophie seemed to have picked up upon. She came over to you as you continued to reminisce about your lost strength, @@.sophieVoice;"How you doing there shorty?"@@ You wanted to snap back at her for that comment, but you realized something, she wasn't wrong. It must have happened recently, but she was taller than you now. It wasn't much, no more than an inch, but it was enough to be noticeable. You'd just lost your status as a boy, and now you'd lost your status as the biggest as well. You'd never really considered Sophie to be some physical powerhouse, her boasts of her athletic prowess had always sounded quaint compared to what you had been capable of. But looking at her now, an inch taller and a few pounds heavier than you, she cut a much more impressive figure. @@.sophieVoice;"You know I've been wondering, which of us is stronger."@@ Sophie drawled, @@.sophieVoice;"I'd meant to find out earlier, but then Emily was talking about how you looked like your mommy, and then we found out you were a girl...so I didn't get a chance. What do you say?"@@ <<if $traitDainty>>[[Accept the challenge|10 to 9 Age Change Accept Dainty]]<<else>>[[Accept the challenge|10 to 9 Age Change Accept 1]]<</if>> [[Reject the challenge|10 to 9 Age Change Reject]] <<set $triedArmWrestleOnce to false>>\ <<set $triedArmWrestleTwice to false>>\You didn't know exactly what kind of competition Sophie had in mind, but you weren't about to back down. It was clear you didn't have the same muscles as before, but you hadn't actually had a chance to test anything. There had been so many changes that even if you'd learned something a few minutes ago, it might be entirely wrong now. As you clasped Sophie's hand you were struck by several facts at once: One, her hand was a little rougher than you'd expected, while your own were @@.girlVoice;baby soft@@ with @@.girlVoice;slender, delicate@@ fingers. Two, her hand was the same size as yours. Before you could have fit your whole hand around hers if she made a fist. Three, her grip was concerningly powerful. Maybe she was just trying to get a good grip, or maybe she was trying to intimidate you. Either way when you tried to squeeze back to counteract the pressure...it didn't do anything. She didn't even seem to register that you'd tried. [[You rubbed at your hand|10 to 9 Age Change Accept Accept Loss Twice]] </span>\You rubbed at your hand, it still stung from when you'd hit it into the table. You were @@.girlVoice;a lot smaller@@ now, so of course you were going to get beaten. <<else>>\ Miki's words didn't make you feel any better. She was six, what did she know about strength? Something that Kara caught onto. She gingerly took your hand, @@.karaVoice;"Sophie!"@@ she threw a glare the red-head's way, @@.karaVoice;"You're being too rough!"@@ @@.emilyVoice;"She's right, you have to be more gentle with <<playerName>>."@@ <<if $playerMaturity <= 7>>\ You were grateful for the defence. Sophie shouldn't be so @@.girlVoice;mean@@ to you. She was so much bigger and you were only little so she should be nice to you. <<elseif $playerMaturity <= 11>>\ You didn't really mind the defence. You weren't thrilled about the fact that Sophie was stronger than you, but it wasn't a huge surprise. The two of you were the same age, and Sophie was bigger...still it hurt a bit to be beaten so soundly. <<changeEmbarassment "small">>\ <<else>>\ You were mortified by the situation. An eight and a seven year old were having to defend you from a nine year old who was 'too tough' for you. On the one hand, it seemed that your changes were slowing down. As you headed back through puberty the changes weren't going to be as drastic. The bodies of prepubescent boys and girls were actually fairly similar. Most of the differences came from other signals. Their hair, wardrobe choices, color choices. Everyone knew that blue was for boys and @@.girlVoice;pink@@ was for girls. <<if $playerMaturity <= 10 || $traitFashionista>>As a result your outfit had a secondary purpose. It was so @@.girlVoice;girly@@ that no one would ever mistake you for a boy.<<else>>If you could get back into a set of boy clothes you might even be able to pass as a boy again.<</if>> Passing for a boy...not a man...you stared at your reflection. Was there anything left of you that was manly? It'd been a while since you'd been truly hairy, but you'd still had peach fuzz. Now you were hairless save for your head. Any remnant of your hard-earned six-pack was gone, you hadn't even noticed it fading, everything else going on had stolen your attention. However, there was one strange feeling that you couldn't identify. Your mouth felt, for lack of a better term, less full. Staring at your smooth, soft face you opened your mouth wide. A closer inspection showed that a few of your molars had disappeared. You didn't know where they had gone, but it seemed you weren't old enough to have them any more. You were dangerously close to crossing the line between man and boy...or maybe you already had. Though that wasn't the only line you were about to cross. You adjusted your underwear just to confirm. You were still male, but that might change at any moment. [[Emily slid up beside you|12 to 11 Age Change 2]]Emily giggled from behind you, @@.emilyVoice;"Hehe, you're starting to look more like me and mommy."@@ You wanted to deny it and shoo her away, but she was basically correct. Your hair was getting lighter, now a dirty blond. It wasn't as bright as Emily's yet, but it seemed only a matter of time. Even your eyes were brighter, sliding from a dull brown towards what you assumed would be a bright blue. For now, they were stuck in a strange half state as a multicoloured hazel. @@.emilyVoice;"Mommy says blonde hair runs in the family for the girls, and since you're-"@@ @@.playerVoice3;"I'm not@@ @@.playerVoice6;a girl!"@@ That probably would have come out more authoritative if your voice hadn't cracked so badly. She shrugged and walked away throwing a parting remark as she did. @@.emilyVoice;"We'll play dressup again soon. Okay?"@@ She didn't wait for an answer. But she didn't need one. If you kept shrinking you'd need a new outfit soon, whether you wanted to or not. [[Look back into the mirror|12 to 11 Age Change 3]]You fiddled with a lock of your lightening hair, watching your reflection do the same. It was becoming increasingly difficult to recognize yourself in the face that stared back at you. You'd come so far from when you'd started this party, as the babysitter. It was hard to look at this almost girl and say she was old enough to babysit anyone, let alone a whole party. Sophie would no doubt be challenging you more and more, considering how close you were in size. It was easy enough to tell her what to do when you had a couple feet on her. Far more difficult when you only had a few inches. You stretched out on your tip toes, trying to give yourself more height, but it just made you look ridiculous. You shook your head, it'd be fine. As mom had said, she'd prepared almost everything; this whole party would basically run itself. <<if $playerMaturity <= 10>>With a @@.girlVoice;delight@@ you realized something.<<else>>With a gnawing discomfort you realized something.<</if>> //This party doesn't need a babysitter at all.// Your mind cast back to your mother's words before she left, "keep the girls company", "relax and have some fun". She'd never told you to "take care of them" or "get them to bed on time" or anything you'd expect an actual babysitter to do, because she didn't expect you to. Sometimes your mom was distressingly clever. She'd assumed that you'd get regressed like this and no longer be able to fulfil the role of babysitter. <<if $playerMaturity <= 10>>You breathed a sigh of relief. You didn't recognize it as your own body, so it felt almost like you were peeping on someone else. <<if $playerMaturity >= 9 && $playerMaturity < 13 || $traitFashionista>>\ It was hard to be sure but it seemed like your breasts had shrunk a little bit. You were thrilled that you wouldn't have to be carrying around those annoying @@.girlVoice;bouncy bits@@. However, all of this was tinged with the negative implication. The changes weren't happening because you were turning back into a guy, they were happening because you were becoming a prepubescent child. You were still a guy though, at least for the moment. Though once you got yourself dressed up you doubted anyone would be able to tell. Despite the fact you were losing those feminine curves you looked even more like a girl than before. All the hard edges on you had been softened, everything was increasingly small and delicate. But all of this consideration was just a delay tactic. Settling them into place you were struck with two awful realizations. One, they didn't look at all out of place on you. Your reflection was, in a very strange sense of the word, normal. Overall they were basically perfect for you, or at least would be soon. <</if>>\ <<else>>\ What you saw in the mirror was a mixed bag. You didn't look like a @@.girlVoice;gross boy@@ anymore, but you also didn't look like you wanted to. You were a @@.girlVoice;big girl@@ and you weren't sure you wanted to be. Having @@.girlVoice;boobies@@ was weird, and they were uncomfortable. You hoped they'd get smaller soon. Of course there was a part of you that wanted to be a big girl, but it made you too different from the rest of the girls. Why couldn't you look more like Emily? You wished you had @@.girlVoice;pretty blonde@@ hair like her, rather than your boring brown. Not that brown was bad, Kara had brown hair and hers was @@.girlVoice;pretty@@ too, if a bit messy. Your eyes had gotten a little lighter as well and sparkled in a way they hadn't before. That @@.girlVoice;delighted@@ you and you wondered if it would continue. There were parts of you that you shouldn't be looking at, even if it was attached to you it made you feel dirty too look at. These fit much better and were @@.girlVoice;much cuter@@ than your old $playerUnderwear. You couldn't believe you used to wear baggy, scratchy clothes like that. <</if>>\ [[Examine yourself further|Dressup Age 12 2b]] <<set $playerUnderwear to "panties">>\As alien as it this body was to you, the changes that had been wrought on you were fascinating. It was still you, there were touches on your face that confirmed that, but no part of you had been spared the changes. Your hard-won muscles had faded. You looked stronger than your average twelve year old girl, but not by much. Even flexing you were only able to get modest definition.\ <<if $traitChubby>>\ It didn't help that all those muscles had a little bit of extra fat covering them, though your limbs had been spared the brunt of your newfound @@.girlVoice;chubbiness@@. Your torso seemed to have gotten the majority of your extra pounds. Obviously there was your @@.girlVoice;plump@@ stomach which hung just over your underwear. [[Back to the party|Dressup Age 12 4]]<div style="float: right; height: 915px; overflow: hidden; margin-left: 15px">\ <<include "Growth Chart">>\ </div>\ Before you were able to exit the room Emily suddenly shouted. @@.emilyVoice;"Wait! We need to do one more thing!"@@ You stopped in the doorway, turning back to see what had drawn Emily's attention. She was standing in front of a growth chart. Your mother had gotten it when Emily was three and measured her again every year. @@.emilyVoice;"Everyone come over here!"@@ Emily gestured to the group and you all dutifully obeyed. Over the next few moments she measured the three other girls and put their names on the chart. You took your place in front of the chart. Emily handed the pen to Sophie and she made a mark for your new height and age. [[See the mark|Dressup Age 12 5]]<div style="float: right; height: 915px; overflow: hidden; margin-left: 15px">\ <<include "Growth Chart">>\ </div>\ @@.emilyVoice;"Oh, and we'll need this."@@ With a wave of her wand one additional mark appeared. "John - Age 16". Almost a full foot above your current height. <<if $playerMaturity <= 10>>\ Looking at the mark felt strange. It was uncomfortable seeing how much shorter you were now. But it also felt like it hadn't changed enough. <<if $playerMaturity <= 6>>You @@.girlVoice;didn't want@@ to be taller than the rest of the girls.<<else>>You didn't mind being taller than the other girls, but you'd rather it was a bit closer.<</if>> <<else>>\ Looking at the mark was disconcerting. The worst part though was the big number 5 //above// your mark. It was a troubling threshold to have crossed. As a teenager being under five foot would be a serious source of derision for any guy. But you @@.girlVoice;weren't a teen@@ anymore, and you were @@.girlVoice;barely a guy@@. <</if>>\ Satisfied with everyone being marked properly it was time to get back to the party proper, at least after you took a few notes in your <<if $playerMaturity <= 12>>@@.girlVoice;diary@@<<else>>journal<</if>>. Even if you didn't go back to Emily's room to get measured properly, you'd always know how tall you were or how @@.girlVoice;short@@. [[Back to the party|Event Handler]] <<silently>>\ <<pushJournalEntry "13To12Age" "Journal 13 to 12 Age" "regression">>\ <<changeHappiness "Miki" true>> <<changeHappiness "Sophie" true>> <<changeHappiness "Emily" true>> <<changeHappiness "Kara" true>> <<set $outfitAge to $playerAge>> <<set $outfitLooseness to 0>> <<set $showGrowthChart to true>> <</silently>>\<<if $playerMaturity <= 6>>\ <<elseif $playerMaturity <= 9>>\ I got to play dress up with the girls! I mean all that's hapened so far was losing my facial hair, and it was kinda gross anyway so I guess I don't really mind. But no way she's stopping there, no way, she'll probably want me as little as the rest of them. That I'm not interested in, a year or two sure, but I don't want to be a kid. <<else>>\ Emily was serious about wanting me to join the party. I'm physically getting younger to better "fit in". The changes have been modest so far; nothing but the loss of my, admittedly minimal, facial hair. But no way Emily is letting it stop there, I need to think of something fast, before I end up pre-teen, or worse.\ <</if>>\Have Emily carry the MC, she's thrilled that she can now pick up her little sister.After the last activity you were feeling a little bit uncomfortable. You'd just gotten a new set of clothes, but they were already getting a little baggy. You didn't think you'd gotten //that// much smaller, but at this age everything was amplified. A few pounds or a couple inches <<if $playerMaturity < 11>>seemed like a lot. You had a @@.girlVoice;vague sense@@ of some math idea that explained this, but you @@.girlVoice;couldn't remember@@ it.<<else>>constituted a bigger percentage of the total.<</if>> Back in school you'd only seemed a little bigger than the freshman, but now Sophie, only two years older, seemed gigantic. You wanted to say that Miki seemed tiny as well, but in truth you weren't that much bigger any more. Not terribly long ago you'd dwarfed the entire group, but now... <<if $traitBabySister>>\ @@.emilyVoice;"Whatcha doing baby sis?"@@ Emily walked up to you. You turned to look at her, realizing that you were now looking //up// at her. She'd already been calling you her @@.girlVoice;baby sister@@, but your size was starting to match. <<elseif $traitLittleSister>>\ @@.emilyVoice;"Whatcha doing little sis?"@@ Emily walked up to you. You turned to look at her, realizing that you were now looking //up// at her. She'd already been calling you her @@.girlVoice;little sister@@, but now your diminutive stature left no room for debate. <<else>>\ @@.emilyVoice;"Whatcha doing little sis?"@@ Emily walked up to you. You opened your mouth to correct her, but realized that you were @@.girlVoice;looking up@@ at her. It was only a few inches, but more than enough to leave no doubt as to who the "big sister" was now. <</if>>\ <<playerVoice "\"I was just thinking...\"">> Before you could finidh your answer Miki tore past you at a full run, followed closely by Sophie with Kara trailing. Kara came to a stop before you, panting, @@.karaVoice;"I told them...not to run...in the house..."@@ [[Emily's eyes lit up|8 to 7 Age Regression 2]]@@.emilyVoice;"That's the perfect idea!"@@ Emily shouted. @@.karaVoice;"What's the perfect...idea?"@@ Kara was still catching her breath. @@.emilyVoice;"A race! We should have a race!"@@ @@.karaVoice;"But..."@@ @@.emilyVoice;"Don't worry it'll be fine."@@ Emily dismissed Kara's attempted protests, @@.emilyVoice;"Miki! Sophie!"@@ Sophie had already caught Miki and it was only Emily's signal that saved Miki from further tickle assaults. The two of them walked over, both of them looked abashed. @@.mikiVoice;"I know we're not supposed to run in the house but-"@@ Miki's eyes were locked on the ground. Emily waved her hand, cutting Miki off, @@.emilyVoice;"no no, it's not like that. I think it's a great idea! We're gonna have a race!"@@ It was clear there was something more to it than just a simple race, and the other girls knew it as well. Sophie and Miki grinned, excited at the possibilities. Kara shook her head at the upcoming mischief, even if she didn't know what it was yet. [[You all waited|8 to 7 Age Regression 3]]As you all waited for Emily to continue you considered the situation. A foot race was something you would have been confident in a few hours ago, but now you had serious doubts. Sophie had already demonstrated her vastly superior physical capabilities. There was no way you were fitter than Emily, and now you were smaller to boot. Kara and Miki felt like beatable foes, but it wasn't guaranteed. The younger you got, the more it seemed like your body was out of your control. You wanted it to do things, but it wasn't always quite up to the task. <<if $playerMaturity >= 10>>Even writing your journal was a struggle. You knew //how// to write more cleanly, but your hands wouldn't cooperate. So even your best attempts looked rough.<<else>>It made the writing in your journal doubly bad. Your knowledge of writing had degraded badly, and now your hands wouldn't even obey properly.<</if>> @@.emilyVoice;"We're gonna have a piggy back race!"@@ Emily said brightly, @@.emilyVoice;"it'll be so much fun, right Sophie?"@@ Sophie took a moment to consider the proposal before nodding. She was always up for competition and clearly had no qualms about running around in the house. Something that you were //not// supposed to be doing. [[Tell them to stop|8 to 7 Age Regression 4a]] [[Let it go for now|8 to 7 Age Regression 4b]]<<playerVoice "\"Mom said no running in the house,\"">> your voice came out @@.girlVoice;whinier@@ than you'd expected. Your voice just kept getting higher. When you were speaking normally it was a @@.girlVoice;pleasant tinkling@@ sound, but when you were complaining it just sounded @@.girlVoice;grating@@ and @@.girlVoice;bratty@@. The other girls glanced at one another and smiled. It sounded like you were only a moment from stomping your foot and having a tantrum. You knew you weren't nearly that upset, but the girls still weren't able to take you seriously. @@.emilyVoice;"Oh don't be a spoil sport, it'll be lots of fun!"@@ <<playerVoice "\"What if someone gets hurt? Or something breaks?\"">> Miki giggled, @@.mikiVoice;"you sound like Kara."@@ Kara opened her mouth to protest, but she had been the one protesting the race only moments ago. @@.emilyVoice;"So are you gonna play?"@@ Emily questioned. [[Continue to protest|8 to 7 Age Regression 5a][$protestPiggybackRace to true]] [[Agree to play|8 to 7 Age Regression 5b]]Considering the situation you realized a little protest on your part wasn't going to stop anything. Back when you were sixteen a stern glare was sometimes enough to cow the girls into obedience. Now that you were eye level with Kara it'd lost a lot of its bite. It didn't help that you wide @@.girlVoice;bright blue eyes@@ gave you a permanent @@.girlVoice;cute@@ and @@.girlVoice;innocent@@ look. You'd seen Emily use that look to get out of trouble so many times that you knew how little authority it contained. @@.sophieVoice;"So who is riding on who?"@@ <<filterlinkreplace "Correct Sophie's grammar">>\ <<if $playerMaturity >= 14>>\ <<playerVoice "\"Whom,\"">> you smoothly corrected. You felt silly about your ignorance.\ <<changeEmbarassment "small">>\ <<else>>\ You had a dim sense that Sophie had misspoken, though you were struggling to figure out what to correct. <<playerVoice "\"Whose,\"">> you blurted out. @@.sophieVoice;"Whose what?"@@ Sophie was confused. We only need four and <<playerName>> is going to play, right?"@@ [[Protest|8 to 7 Age Regression 5a][$protestPiggybackRace to true]] [[Agree to play|8 to 7 Age Regression 5b]]You shook your head. Kara's protests hadn't encouraged you about the prospect and you didn't really trust any of the girls to carry you. You weren't //that// much smaller than them, could they really carry you? Miki sensed your concern, and giggled, @@.mikiVoice;"<<playerName>> thinks she's too big for piggy backs."@@ What you hadn't noticed was Sophie sneaking around and positioning herself behind you. Your first indication was feeling her arms wrap around your waist. <<playerVoice "\"Eeeeee,\"">> you @@.girlVoice;squealed@@ as your balance tipped and your feet left the ground. Reflexively you kicked your foot to regain balance. but only found empty air. You @@.girlVoice;squirmed@@ against Sophie's grip, but she continued to hold you aloft. @@.sophieVoice;"See? No problem at all."@@ You couldn't see Sophie's face right now, but you could picture her arrogant grin in your mind's eye. You went limp and she lowered you back down to the ground. As you turned you could see a bead of sweat on her forehead. Clearly it hadn't been quite as easy as she'd made it out to be. Sophie was strong, and you were less than fifty pounds, but that was still a lot for a girl her age. But she'd proven she could do it, and it was //much// easier to carry someone on piggy back. Looking up at Sophie you couldn't bring yourself to continue to refuse. She wasn't being aggressive, but her mere size made your instincts scream that you should do what she said. <<if $playerMaturity >= 10>>You couldn't quite accept that Sophie was the @@.girlVoice;big girl@@ of the group, but right now it felt impossible to argue.<<else>>It made sense. Sophie was the @@.girlVoice;big girl@@ of the group, you should obey her.<</if>> Thoroughly cowed by Sophie's display you looked down and nodded, <<playerVoice "\"I'll play.\"">> [[Prepare for the race|8 to 7 Age Regression 6]]@@.emilyVoice;"Great!"@@ Emily cheered, @@.emilyVoice;"so I'll carry <<playerName>> and Sophie can carry Miki."@@ @@.karaVoice;"Are you sure? Shouldn't Sophie carry <<playerName>>?"@@ @@.emilyVoice;"What? [[Prepare for the race|8 to 7 Age Regression 6]]@@.mikiVoice;"This is gonna be fun!"@@ Miki tittered, lining herself up behind Emily. There was a bit of a struggle, but the two of them managed to get Miki up into position. It was clear that Emily was struggling under the weight, but was more than capable of keeping steady and stable. @@.sophieVoice;"Come on, don't just stare."@@ Sophie chided. Or she tripped? Or slipped? Or... @@.mikiVoice;"Come on, come on!"@@ Miki was eager to go and you were holding things up. Reluctantly you hopped onto Sophie's back. With a minimum of effort she pulled herself back up to her full height. You gripped tight onto her, suddenly struck by a small bout of vertigo. You marveled at how high up you were, or at least how high up it felt. It was ridiculous, you'd been way taller than this only a few hours ago. <<if $traitAfraidOfHeights>>It wasn't high enough to make you //too// scared, but you did redouble your grip.<</if>> @@.sophieVoice;"Don't worry, I got you."@@ Sophie bounced you slightly to show her stability, but the jostle just made you grip even tighter. @@.karaVoice;"Everyone ready?"@@ Everyone nodded. @@.karaVoice;"Okay...3...2...1..."@@ [[Go!|8 to 7 Age Regression 7]]You @@.girlVoice;squealed@@ as Sophie lurched into action, getting a jump on Emily. You heard a matching squeal from Miki as both pairs started off. Sophie's footsteps were leaden. She was moving at a decent speed, but clearly wasn't used to running while weighing 100 lbs. Emily was also struggling. Miki was lighter than you, but Emily wasn't as strong as Sophie. As the two of you rounded the first corner you realized you didn't actually know the rules of the race, or the route that was being followed. You could make a good guess at the route, this floor only had one good loop that could be followed, but you didn't know how many laps. You were going to just have to hold on for dear life and hope that Sophie stayed sturdy. [[And the winner is...|8 to 7 Age Regression 9]]As Sophie skidded across the finish line you were ecstatic as your victory. Emily had been close, but she was still several steps behind. You didn't need Kara to tell you who had won. Unfortunately, your enthusiasm made you lose your grip on Sophie. She realized what was happening in the last moment and tried to recover it, but wasn't fast enough. The two of you tumbled to the ground. It was a mess of limbs as you finally came to a stop, a sharp pain spiking inside your mouth before subsiding as quickly as it came. @@.karaVoice;"Is everyone okay?"@@ Kara had rushed over to the crash site. You took stock of yourself, other than that sharp pain, you'd come out of this unharmed. The same wasn't true for Sophie, @@.sophieVoice;"owww,"@@ she hissed as she started to untangle herself. You realized that the reason for your health was that your fall had been cushioned. Sophie had been the one to hit the floor, and you'd landed on her. But it was no random happenstance. Time had slowed down in the moments during the fall and you distinctly remembered Sophie twisting herself, to make sure that you'd be protected. But why would she do that? <<if $sophieHappiness <= 3>>Sophie //hated// you.<<elseif $sophieHappiness <= 6>>She didn't even like you.<<else>>The two of you were friends, but that was an awfully selfless act.<</if>> Miki and Emily rushed over to the pile as Sophie got herself back into a sitting position. @@.emilyVoice;"Are you okay!?"@@ Emily's voice was shrill and panicked. [[You nodded|8 to 7 Age Regression 10]]Thanks to Sophie's intervention, you'd dodged most of the danger. Though Emily's concern was surprising; the fall hadn't been that bad, normally she probably would have just laughed at you. Your reassurance wasn't enough to soothe her concerns. Both her and Kara were checking you over for any sign of injury. @@.sophieVoice;"I'm fine too, thanks for asking."@@ Sophie grumbled, annoyed at the lack of concern for her wellbeing. Emily turned back to you, @@.emilyVoice;"are you sure you're okay?"@@ You nodded back and gave a smile. Admittedly you were more shaken up than you'd expected, but nothing that you couldn't handle. You didn't want to seem even more @@.girlVoice;delicate@@. [[Miki gasped|8 to 7 Age Regression 11]]@@.mikiVoice;"<<playerName>> lost a tooth!"@@ Miki pointed at your smile. Her fingers had barely touched you before you erupted into @@.girlVoice;giggles@@. <<playerVoice "\"Stop...stop!\"">> You vainly tried to protest through gasps of air. It had only been a moment, but you were already a @@.girlVoice;squirming@@, @@.girlVoice;giggly@@ mess. Tears forming in your eyes from laughing too hard. <<if $traitWeakBladder>>If this kept up for another few moments you were going to @@.girlVoice;wet yourself@@.<</if>> Resisting her was entirely impossible, even if you could focus enough to try and move her hands, she was too strong for it to work. <<playerVoice "\"I give up!\"">> You @@.girlVoice;squealed@@, prompting Sophie to let you go. The entire thing had lasted no more than five seconds. You had been totally @@.girlVoice;helpess@@ against even the briefest of tickles. You worried about what would happen in the future, there was no way the girls weren't going to abuse this weakness. With no obvious escape, and Sophie's fingers at the ready, you resigned yourself to the fate. you took Emily's hand and followed her upstairs. [[Give in|9 to 8 Age Regression 2]] <<changeEmbarassment "small">>\<<if $resistTickle>>\ You were not able to resist Sophie's assault for long. Apparently the 8 year old girl version of you had an extremely @@.girlVoice;ticklish@@ stomach. So you finally cried out, <<playerVoice "\"Okay stop, you win, you win stop,\"">> you words were still coming out in fits and starts through the tears and the @@.girlVoice;giggling@@. Finally Sophie released you and Emily once again offered you her hand. This time you took it and followed Emily upstairs. <</if>>\ Sitting on Emily's bed you watched as the girl's tore through Emily's closet looking for the perfect outfits. This time was much more contentious than the last. There were outfits being pulled and tossed, mixed and matched, compared and contrasted. Some of this conflict stemmed from simply having more options. For the twelve year old version of you Emily had tried to pick more 'mature' outfits. The closet's magic would make sure it fit no matter what, but the style of an eight year old wouldn't usually suit a pre-teen. Now there was no such complication, you were the @@.girlVoice;same age as Emily@@, so you'd look @@.girlVoice;right@@ in the stuff she normally wore. <<if $playerMaturity >= 12>>Grimly<<elseif $playerMaturity >=10>>Interestingly<<else>>Excitedly<</if>> you noted that the closet didn't even need to be magic for this dress-up session. You were the @@.girlVoice;same size@@, so you could @@.girlVoice;easily share clothes@@. It was something about that changed the tenor of the session. Before it had been a little sister taking a twisted glee in dressing up her older brother. Now it was a @@.girlVoice;twin sister just sharing her clothes@@. The entire scene could play out in the opposite direction, with you picking an outfit for Emily, and no one would bat an eye. [[Consider the outfits|Dressup Age 8 Outfits]]<<silently>>\ <<set _outfitImageLink1 to getOutfitInfo(13).imageLink>>\ <<set _outfitImageLink2 to getOutfitInfo(14).imageLink>>\ <<set _outfitImageLink3 to getOutfitInfo(15).imageLink>>\ <<set _outfitImageLink4 to getOutfitInfo(16).imageLink>>\ <<set _outfitImageLink5 to getOutfitInfo(17).imageLink>>\ <<set _outfitImageLink6 to getOutfitInfo(18).imageLink>>\ <</silently>>\ Despite the dozens of outfits that had been considered, you were being presented with only six. Considering the smiles on the girls they seemed very pleased with their work. They didn't care what outfit you picked really, it was more about the fun of the dressup. The first was a combination of a @@.girlVoice;pink blouse@@ with short jean shorts. <<if $playerOutfit === 1>>It was actually not terribly dissimilar from what you were wearing already.<<else>>You'd seen something similar the first time Emily had dressed you up.<</if>> Last time the shorts had been adorned with some stylish tears. These ones were just haphazardly covered in hearts. Gone was even the implication you could be in higher learning. This one just had the word "love" written in cursive on the front, bereft of any context. @@.girlVoice;Frilly sleeves@@ completed the look. <<Image _outfitImageLink1 "small">>\ [[Pick this one|9 to 8 Age Regression 3][$playerOutfit to 13]] The second was a combination piece. The base was a @@.girlVoice;light pink princess dress@@ that would come just past your knees. The long sleeves had a cinch just behind the wrist so that the end of the sleeves @@.girlVoice;puffed@@ out a little, matching the profile of the skirt. The entire sleeve was a little loose so it had a @@.girlVoice;billowing elegant@@ look. The second piece was a jean vest. A glance to Kara's own jean jacket made you wonder if one had inspired the other. Though while Kara's jean jacket was fairly sedate, this vest had some extra embellishments. There was a large @@.girlVoice;pink ribbon@@ below each of the breast pockets, and the collar was studded with @@.girlVoice;pink beads@@. <<Image _outfitImageLink2 "small">>\ [[Pick this one|9 to 8 Age Regression 3][$playerOutfit to 14]] The third was where Emily had really let herself go wild. It was a knee length dress, but the rest was difficult to describe. It was a @@.girlVoice;rainbow of colors@@, but each color had it's own layer going sideways across the dress. It gave almost a tulle effect, but perpendicular to how it usually was. There was also an asymmetry to it, the right shoulder flowed straight into one of those layers, the left shoulder dipped lower, connected to the dress by a @@.girlVoice;lacy pink@@ strap. Emily had also put a beaded necklace out with it, to complete the look. It wasn't something you figured she'd wear on a normal day, but it did fit for a party. <<Image _outfitImageLink3 "small">>\ [[Pick this one|9 to 8 Age Regression 3][$playerOutfit to 15]] The fourth continued the trend and was another dress. It was much less frilly than the previous two, but somehow that simplicity made it seem even more @@.girlVoice;youthful@@. The dress itself was a solid @@.girlVoice;pink@@, with some frills around the shoulders. It had long sleeves which were pink with white stripes. The dress also had a graphic that made it look like you were wearing a purse. The effect made it even more @@.girlVoice;childish@@, not a mature woman with a purse, but a @@.girlVoice;little girl@@ playing at being a @@.girlVoice;big kid@@. <<Image _outfitImageLink4 "small">>\ [[Pick this one|9 to 8 Age Regression 3][$playerOutfit to 16]] The fifth finally broke the trend and was a simple long sleeve shirt and pants. Though far be it from them to look more 'manly'. The pants were a @@.girlVoice;bright rainbow@@ what normally would have been dark purple having been replaced with a @@.girlVoice;bright pink@@. The shirt was even more a cornucopia of colors. The sleeves were a matching rainbow but the main shirt had bunch of @@.girlVoice;flowers@@ in various styles. Some even with hearts in the center. There was an elephant and a giraffe and the words "Beautiful Far Away Journey" across the bottom. It was a mess of colors and shapes that no one even in middle school would be caught dead in. <<Image _outfitImageLink5 "small">>\ [[Pick this one|9 to 8 Age Regression 3][$playerOutfit to 17]] The last one was a sort of 'school outfit', only because it was more reserved than the rest of them. Which isn't to say 'less girly'. The @@.girlVoice;pink t-shirt@@ had a @@.girlVoice;unicorn@@ with headphones on the front. With @@.girlVoice;hearts@@ on it's leg, a @@.girlVoice;rainbow@@ horn, and more @@.girlVoice;rainbow hearts@@ floating around it, in case the theme wasn't clear enough. The jean skirt was barely mid thigh and had a @@.girlVoice;flowery strap@@ to act as a pseudo belt. <<Image _outfitImageLink6 "small">>\ [[Pick this one|9 to 8 Age Regression 3][$playerOutfit to 18]] <<filterlinkreplace "Refuse to pick anything">>\ Emily frowned, @@.emilyVoice;"I was being nice and letting you pick. You supposed you should, if Kara wanted you to, but you didn't really see why. You were the same age after all, what did it matter if they saw you in your underwear? Regardless you nodded and made your way to the bathroom, outfit in hand. Closing the door behind you, you were left alone in the privacy of the room. You started to get changed. <<elseif $playerMaturity <= 9>>\ For a moment you considered just changing your outfit there and then. You were all girls here, it wasn't like they would be seeing anything untoward. Hell, Emily would basically just be looking into a mirror. It really wouldn't be much of an issue. Still, something felt a little awkward about it. Even if they were the same age you consciously knew you were supposed to try and get some privacy. Even if it didn't bother you, you wouldn't want to make anything awkward. So you made your way to the bathroom. Closing the door behind you, you took a breath. That slight awkward feeling gone now that you were alone. Now in private you began to get changed. <<else>>\ You took the outfit and made your way to the bathroom to get changed. Just because you were their age now didn't mean you were about to change in front of them. You still had your modesty and changing into a girly outfit in full public view was a gross violation of that. So you made your way to the bathroom. Closing the door behind you, you began to get changed. <</if>>\ In your mostly undressed state you took a look at your body. You didn't get a lot of opportunity to calmly check yourself, and with your body changing the way it was, there were always new things to see. Though in this case it was less that there was anything new to see, but the conspicuous lack of anything to see. You hadn't been 'womanly' in quite some time, but you'd at least had some feminine traits. @@.girlVoice;Now all of that was gone@@. You were flat, everywhere. Even the slight curve of your hips had faded away. The last hints of puberty having been erased from your body.
