@@.girlVoice;You've got chubby but narrowish hips and a chunky ass.@@\ <</if>>\ <<elseif $traitChubby>>\ <<if $playerAge >= 15>>\ You've got a narrow hip structure with a little extra padding, complimented by a slightly plump ass.\ <<elseif $playerAge >= 14>>\ You've got a widening hip structure with some extra padding, and a noticeable ass.\ <<elseif $playerAge >= 13>>\ You've got very wide hips and a protruding uncomfortably bouncy ass.\ <<elseif $playerAge >= 11>>\ You've got wide hips and a big ass.\ <<elseif $playerAge >= 9>>\ You've got no hips and a moderate ass.\ <<elseif $playerAge >= 6>>\ You've got @@.girlVoice;narrow hip structure with a little extra padding and a chubby ass.@@\ <<elseif $playerAge >= 2>>\ You've still got @@.girlVoice;baby fat on your hips and ass.@@\ <<else>>\ @@.girlVoice;You've got chubby but narrowish hips and a chunky ass.@@\ <</if>>\ <<else>>\ <<if $playerAge >= 15>>\ You've got narrow hips with a flat ass.\ <<elseif $playerAge >= 14>>\ You've got widening hips and a noticeable ass.\ <<elseif $playerAge >= 13>>\ You've got wide hips and an uncomfortably bouncy ass.\ <<elseif $playerAge >= 11>>\ You've got somewhat wide hips and a slightly protruding ass.\ <<elseif $playerAge >= 9>>\ You've got hips with just a hint of curve and a pert ass.\ <<elseif $playerAge >= 6>>\ You've got @@.girlVoice;narrow hips and a flat ass.@@\ <<elseif $playerAge >= 2>>\ You've still got @@.girlVoice;a little baby fat on your hips and ass.@@\ <<else>>\ @@.girlVoice;You've got chubby but narrow hips and a chunky ass.@@\ <</if>>\ <</if>>\ <<if $traitCatgirl>>\ A long <<if $playerAge <= 10>>blonde<<else>>brown<</if>> tail trails behind you. Twitching of its own accord. \ <</if>>\ /*Crotch*/ <<if $mannequinTransformation >= 7>>\ Your groin is smooth featureless plastic.\ <<elseif $playerMaturity <= 3>>\ @@.girlVoice;Mommy says you've got a "foo foo", whatever that means.@@\ <<elseif $playerAge >= 15>>\ You don't want to brag, but you're packing down under.\ <<elseif $playerAge >= 13>>\ You don't want to talk about it, but your private parts seem diminished.\ <<elseif $playerAge >= 11>>\ You don't want to talk about it, but your private parts seem severely diminished.\ <<elseif $playerAge >= 8>>\ You don't have anything @@.girlVoice;down there@@ anymore.\ <<else>>\ You know you've got @@.girlVoice;girl parts and not boy parts.@@\ <</if>>\ /*Hair*/ You have $hairLength \ <<if $playerAge >= 14>>\ dark brown \ <<elseif $playerAge >= 11>>\ light brown \ <<elseif $playerAge >= 8>>\ dirty @@.girlVoice;blonde@@ \ <<elseif $playerAge >= 3>>\ @@.girlVoice;light blonde@@ \ <<else>>\ @@.girlVoice;bleach blonde@@ \ <</if>>\ hair styled in <<hairstyle>>.\ /*Voice*/ <<if $mannequinTransformation >= 9>>\ You have no voice.\ <<else>>\ You have a\ <<if $playerAge >= 14>>\ solid, baritone voice.\ <<elseif $playerAge >= 12>>\ a baritone voice that cracks on occasion.\ <<elseif $playerAge >= 11>>\ a tenor voice that @@.girlVoice;constantly cracks@@.\ <<elseif $playerAge >= 8>>\ @@.girlVoice;pretty@@, treble voice.\ <<elseif $playerAge >= 2>>\ @@.girlVoice;high, angelic@@ voice.\ <<else>>\ @@.girlVoice;high, burbling@@ voice.\ <</if>>\ <</if>>\ /*Feet*/ You have\ <<if $mannequinTransformation >= 5>>\ smooth, toeless, nailess, featureless "feet", size <<if $playerAge >= 1>><<print $shoeSizeArray[$playerAge]>><<else>>2C<</if>>. <<else>>\ <<if $playerAge >= 14>>\ hairy, clunky \ <<elseif $playerAge >= 12>>\ @@.girlVoice;smooth@@, wide \ <<elseif $playerAge >= 10>>\ @@.girlVoice;smooth@@, narrow \ <<elseif $playerAge >= 8>>\ @@.girlVoice;small, soft@@ \ <<elseif $playerAge >= 4>>\ @@.girlVoice;tiny, delicate@@ \ <<elseif $playerAge >= 2>>\ @@.girlVoice;stubby, fragile@@ \ <<else>>\ @@.girlVoice;infantile@@ \ <</if>>\ feet, size <<if $playerAge >= 1>><<print $shoeSizeArray[$playerAge]>><<else>>2C<</if>>.<<if $havePaintedToenails>> With @@.girlVoice pedicured nails@@ painted a @@.girlVoice;cute $toenailColor@@.<</if>> <</if>>\ Coordination: <<set $effectiveCoordinationAge to $playerAge - ($traitClumsy * 2)>>\ <<if $mannequinTransformation >= 9>>\ You can't move any part of your body, however your arms can be rotated by others. <<elseif $mannequinTransformation >= 8>>\ You can't move your legs or torso, but your arms could move if allowed. <<elseif $mannequinTransformation >= 7>>\ You can't move your legs, but the rest of you could move if allowed. <<elseif $effectiveCoordinationAge >= 15>>\ You have full control of your impressive physique, making you both strong and fast. <<elseif $effectiveCoordinationAge >= 13>>\ At times you can be a little awkward, but otherwise have full fine tuned control of your body. <<elseif $effectiveCoordinationAge >= 10>>\ You have increasing control of your muscles and are able to play more complex sports and make more detailed artwork. <<elseif $effectiveCoordinationAge >= 9>>\ You are capable of all of the tasks to get yourself ready in the morning, and before going to bed at night. <<elseif $effectiveCoordinationAge >= 8>>\ You can shakily ride a bike, draw more complex shapes and play simple sports. <<elseif $effectiveCoordinationAge >= 7>>\ You're starting to get the feel for swimming, and can even climb a little. You can just manage writing with a pencil. <<elseif $effectiveCoordinationAge >= 6>>\ You can almost tie your shoelaces. You can run, jump and skip, but you can't swim or ride a bike. <<elseif $effectiveCoordinationAge >= 5>>\ You're dexterous enough to dress yourself, but you can't tie your shoelaces. You can sketchily draw a few letters. <<elseif $effectiveCoordinationAge >= 4>>\ You've got the ability to walk both forwards and backwards. You can vaguely use scissors and occasionally catch a bounced ball. <<elseif $effectiveCoordinationAge >= 3>>\ You can climb stairs with some support, jump in place and even use forks and spoons comfortably. Though buttons and zippers are too hard. <<elseif $playerAge >= 2 && !$traitClumsy>>\ You're able to awkwardly run, though you often fall when you do. Can crudely grip a crayon in your fist. <<elseif $playerAge >= 1>>\ You are capable of a shaky walk and coarse control of extremely simple tools like a spoon. <<elseif $playerAge >= 0.5>>\ With supreme effort you are able to stand, as long as you have something to support you. <<elseif $playerAge >= 0.3>>\ You cannot stand, let alone walk. You can support your weight while sitting. <<else>>\ You can't stand, sit or even roll over under your own power. <</if>>\<<silently>>\ <<set $effectiveEducationAge to $playerMaturity>> <<set _calculusMark to 85 - ((16 - $effectiveEducationAge) * 15) - ($traitEnergetic * 5) - ($traitSlowLearner * 5)>> <<set _englishMark to 70 - ((16 - $effectiveEducationAge) * 15) - ($traitSoftspoken * 5) - ($traitLisp * 5) - ($traitSlowLearner * 5) - ($traitBabyTalk * 5)>> <<set _algebraMark to 85 - ((16 - $effectiveEducationAge) * 15) - ($traitOblivious * 10) - ($traitSlowLearner * 5)>> <<set _physicsMark to 80 - ((16 - $effectiveEducationAge) * 15) - ($traitDaydreamer * 10) - ($traitSlowLearner * 5)>> <<set _peMark to 90 - ((16 - $playerAge) * 10) - ($traitClumsy * 15) - (($traitFat + $traitChubby) * 5) - ($traitDainty * 10) - ($traitRapunzelHair * 5)>> <<set _peMark to Math.clamp(_peMark, 0, 100)>> <<set _accountingMark to 85 - ((16 - $effectiveEducationAge) * 15) - ($traitForgetful * 10) - ($traitSlowLearner * 5)>> <<set _historyMark to 70 - ((16 - $effectiveEducationAge) * 15) - ($traitGiggly * 5) - ($traitCrybaby * 5) - ($traitSlowLearner * 5)>> <<set _chemistryMark to 75 - ((16 - $effectiveEducationAge) * 15) - ($traitChatterbox * 5) - ($traitSlowLearner * 5)>> <<set _averageMark to (_calculusMark + _englishMark + _algebraMark + _physicsMark + _peMark + _accountingMark + _historyMark + _chemistryMark) / 8>> <<set _classPercentile to 50>> <<script>> State.temporary.averageMark = Number.parseFloat(State.temporary.averageMark).toPrecision(2); State.temporary.classPercentile = Math.max(Math.trunc(50 + (State.temporary.averageMark - 70) * 2), 1); <</script>> <</silently>>\ <<nobr>>\ <div class="highschool-reportcard"> <div style="display: flex; < 60>>Poor marks overall, student will need additional instruction or may fail.<<elseif _averageMark < 70>>Subpar marks overall, student at risk of failure.<</if>></div></div> </div> <div> ''Grading System'' <div style="display: flex;"> <div style="margin-right: 8px;"> A+ = 95% to 100% <br> A = 87% to 94% <br> A- = 80% to 86% <br> B+ = 77% to 79% <br> B = 73% to 86% <br> B- = 70% to 72% <br> </div> <div> C+ = 67% to 69% <br> C = 63% to 66% <br> C- = 60% to 62% <br> D+ = 57% to 59% <br> D = 52% to 56% <br> D- = 50% to 52% <br> F = 0 to 49% </div> </div> </div> </div> <</nobr>><<silently>>\ <<script>> State.temporary.averageMark = Number.parseFloat(State.temporary.averageMark).toPrecision(2); State.temporary.classPercentile = Math.trunc(50 + (State.temporary.averageMark - 70) * 2); A compulsion that meant, once you'd spent all your own money, you had to @@.girlVoice;whine@@ and @@.girlVoice;beg@@ for someone else to buy it for you. <</if>>\ <<if $traitTicklish>>\ ''Ticklish'' <<if $playerAge <= 8>>\ @@.girlVoice;Girls your age@@ always had sensitive skin that made them quite ticklish. But your sensitivity was on a whole other level.\ <<else>>\ Your skin was dangerously sensitive.\ <</if>>\ If anyone started tickling your stomach or underarms you'd be @@.girlVoice;laughing and squirming helplessly@@ in only moments. Your feet were absolutely the worst, if someone got ahold of those you'd @@.girlVoice;agree to anything@@ to make them stop. <</if>>\ <<if $traitAllergies>>\ ''Summer Allergies'' You'd been afflicted with a nasty case of pollen allergies. Your @@.girlVoice;nose ran@@, you @@.girlVoice;kept sneezing@@, and your eyes were @@.girlVoice;red and puffy@@. It wasn't anything severe, but it was enough to make you a little miserable when it happened. Especially since it seemed that basically every different pollen triggered the same response. <</if>>\ <<if $traitBrony>>\ <<if $playerAge >= 13>>\ ''Brony'' You lie well outside the target market for @@.girlVoice;My Little Pony@@, but you @@.girlVoice;love it@@ anyway. <<elseif $playerAge >= 10>>\ ''Pegasister'' You're a little too old to watch @@.girlVoice;My Little Pony@@, but you @@.girlVoice;love it@@ anyway. However, no one would think you were a "bro" anymore. <<else>>\ ''MLP Target Audience'' No one would bat an eye at your love of @@.girlVoice;My Little Pony@@. Like most @@.girlVoice;girls your age@@ you couldn't get enough of @@.girlVoice;ponies@@ and @@.girlVoice;unicorns@@ and @@.girlVoice;pegasi@@. <</if>>\ <</if>>\ <<if $traitCutieMarkedLight || $traitCutieMarkedSevere>>\ ''Cutie Marked'' <<if $traitCutieMarkedSevere>>\ You've been adorned with the cutie marks for 'Twilight Sparkle', 'Rainbow Dash', 'Fluttershy', 'Rarity', 'Applejack', and 'Pinkie Pie'. If you hadn't known their names before they were slowly burning into your mind now. Anyone who saw your over-abundance of @@.girlVoice;My Little Pony@@ would immediately assume you were a @@.girlVoice;totally obsessed superfan@@, no matter what you said. <<else>>\ You've been adorned with the cutie mark of 'Twilight Sparkle' on your right cheek, and 'Rainbow Dash' on your left. So it was visible to everyone that you were a @@.girlVoice;superfan@@ of @@.girlVoice;My Little Pony@@, no matter what you said. <</if>>\ <</if>>\ <<if $traitNeat>>\ ''Neat Freak'' It wasn't that you demanded everything be spotless, but why couldn't people put stuff back into it's proper place? An ordered life led to an ordered mind, and you always felt more @@.girlVoice;comfortable in a tidy room@@. Which is why you tidied every chance you could, there was just something so @@.girlVoice;soothing@@ about cleaning. <</if>>\ <<if $traitChubby>>\ ''Chubby'' Your overindulgence has left it's mark on your body. You felt the consequences every time you walked and you could feel the @@.girlVoice;extra weight@@ and the @@.girlVoice;jiggle@@ of your stomach. It also meant none of your clothes fit quite right<<if $playerAge <= 12>>, despite the promises of Emily's closet.<</if>> <</if>>\ <<if $traitWeakBladder>>\ ''Weak Bladder'' It was awfully embarrassing, but you've been having some issues with your bladder. Sometimes you felt like you needed to pee but didn't, other it went from a slight urge to a desperate feeling seemingly within moments. At the back of your mind there was a nagging worry that you might have an @@.girlVoice;accident@@ if you weren't cautious. And that was during the day; night time was of even greater concern. You'd be mortified if you ever @@.girlVoice;wet the bed@@, but what could you do about it? <</if>>\ <<if $traitNaive>>\ ''Naive'' TODO <</if>>\ <<if $traitImaginaryFriend>>\ <<switch $traitImaginaryFriend>>\ <<case 1>>\ ''Inner Child'' You've met a young girl inside your dreams. Her identity remains a mystery, but you want to meet her again and know you will. <<case 2>>\ ''Imaginary Friend'' $imaginaryFriendName had come from your dreams into the real world, though no one else could see her or hear her. She was endlessly friendly and always wanted to chat and play but you had to be concious of when you spoke to her, you wouldn't want the others to think you were crazy. <<case 3>>\ ''Alter Ego'' $imaginaryFriendName was even closer to you now. Sometimes her words came out of your mouth, and you did the things she wanted to do without thinking. You could give your own input, but if she really wanted to do something, it was her decision. It almost felt like you were the @@.girlVoice;imaginary friend@@, and she was the real one. <</switch>>\ <</if>>\ <<if $traitNurseryRhymer || $traitDivaInTraining || $traitMouseketeer>>\ <span class="header">Earworms:</span> These songs were just @@.girlVoice;so catchy@@ that they seemed permanently stuck inside you head. The only way to get some peace and quiet was by singing them to yourself. Plus if someone else started up a song you didn't have a choice but to @@.girlVoice;sing along@@. <<if $traitNurseryRhymer>>\ ''Nursery Rhymer'' @@.musicalNoteEmoji;🎵@@@@.girlVoice;"The itsy bitsy spider went up the waterspout. Down came the rain-"@@@@.musicalNoteEmoji;🎵@@ You couldn't help but hummed rhymes like that to yourself and of course you had to make the related gestures, otherwise it didn't count. <</if>>\ <<if $traitDivaInTraining>>\ ''Diva In Training'' TODO <</if>>\ <<if $traitMouseketeer>>\ ''Mouseketeer'' @@.musicalNoteEmoji;🎵@@@@.girlVoice;"Let it go. Let it go. Can't hold it back anymore."@@@@.musicalNoteEmoji;🎵@@ <<if $playerMaturity >= 14>>Your brain was infested with seemingly endless Disney songs. The moment you managed to clear one, another always popped in.<<elseif $playerMaturity >= 10>>Your brain has made room for seemingly endless Disney songs, though it seemed to prefer anything sung by a <<if $knowledgeDisneyPrincesses>>@@.girlVoice;princess@@ and not just the official ones.<<else>>@@.girlVoice;princess@@.<</if>><<else>>You were thrilled that you knew so many Disney songs, you especially loved the ones by the @@.girlVoice;princesses@@.<</if>> <</if>>\ <</if>>\ <span class="header">Fears:</span> <<if $traitClaustrophobic>>\ ''Afraid of Tight Spaces'' Tight spaces made you very uncomfortable. It wasn't so severe that any enclosed space was a problem, but the second the walls started getting tight you started sweating. If you ever did get trapped somewhere too tight it would only be moments before you would @@.girlVoice;melt down@@, no matter how unhelpful that would be. <</if>>\ <<if $traitAfraidOfTheDark>>\ ''Afraid of the Dark'' <<if $traitAfraidOfMonsters>>\ You're absolutely @@.girlVoice;terrified of the dark@@. You can't help but panic about what @@.girlVoice;monsters@@ might be lurking in the shadows. There were so many @@.girlVoice;scary things@@ out there: @@.girlVoice;zombies@@, @@.girlVoice;vampires@@, @@.girlVoice;goblins@@, @@.girlVoice;imps@@ and even @@.girlVoice;ghosts@@. No matter how little darkness it was there was always room for //something// to be ready to eat you. You'll refuse to go anywhere that's too dark. You'll always sleep with a night light on and if you are forced to go into the dark, you'll absolutely need to @@.girlVoice;hold someone's hand@@. <<elseif $playerMaturity <= 8>>\ You're absolutely @@.girlVoice;terrified of the dark@@. You keep telling yourself that @@.girlVoice;monsters aren't real@@, but when faced with that inky blackness, you doubt yourself. Imagining all sorts of @@.girlVoice;beasts@@ ready to leap out at you. Given the choice you'll refuse to go anywhere that's too dark. You'll always sleep with a night light on and if you are forced to go into the dark, you'll need to @@.girlVoice;hold someone's hand@@. <<else>>\ Despite your age you're still awfully @@.girlVoice;afraid of the dark@@. You mind conjures up all manner of danger that could be lurking there. You're old enough to not believe in monsters, but burglars, murderers and kidnappers are all too real. Given the choice you'll avoid going anywhere that's even dim. You'll always sleep with a night light on and if you're forced to go into the dark you don't want to @@.girlVoice;go alone@@. <</if>>\ <</if>>\ <<if $traitMonophobia>>\ ''Afraid of Being Alone'' You @@.girlVoice;don't like being alone@@. You can tolerate it for a little bit but that dislike quickly progresses to discomfort and then into outright @@.girlVoice;fear@@. You only feel comfortable if you know there is someone nearby. Even when you're with others, you have an irrational fear they might abandon you. As a result you can end up being @@.girlVoice;annoyingly clingy@@. <</if>>\ <<if $traitAfraidOfHeights>>\ ''Afraid of Heights'' Any time you get more than a few feet off the ground you @@.girlVoice;start to get nervous@@. Any higher than that and a combination of vertigo and fear becomes crippling. You didn't want to admit that you're @@.girlVoice;scared of heights@@ but you'd much rather keep your feet planted on the ground. <</if>>\ <<if $traitAfraidOfMonsters>>\ ''Afraid of Monsters'' Ghosts, goblins, fearsome beasts and monsters under the bed. All of these things were supposed to be the domain of fantasy books. But they @@.girlVoice;terrified@@ you. A cold wind might be a @@.girlVoice;ghost@@ sneaking up on you. Scratches on the floor a sign of @@.girlVoice;goblins@@ in the house. And you always had to be ready to pull your blankets over your head at night; everyone knew that was the only way to ward away the @@.girlVoice;scary monster under the bed@@. There were just @@.girlVoice;so many things to be scared of@@. <</if>> <<if $traitAfraidOfBugs>>\ ''Afraid of Creepy Crawlies'' @@.girlVoice;Slugs@@ and @@.girlVoice;spiders@@ and @@.girlVoice;frogs@@ and @@.girlVoice;worms@@, you hated everything that slithered around on the ground. The sight of one of them was @@.girlVoice;disgusting@@ enough, but the idea of one of them @@.girlVoice;crawling@@ towards you was enough to have you @@.girlVoice;run screaming@@. If one actually //touched// you, you'd probably @@.girlVoice;faint@@. <</if>>\ <span class="header">Curses:</span> <<if $traitRapunzelHair>>\ ''Rapunzel Hair'' The length of your hair is insanely out of control. It pools around your feet when you stand still and you had to be careful when you walked lest you trip over the excess dragging on the floor. The curse wasn't even done. If not for the @@.girlVoice;cute hairclips@@ in your hair it would just keep growing. A few minutes without them and you would //really// be in a Rapunzel situation. Cutting it wouldn't work either, even with the hairclips it would grow back in an instant. Luckily another part of the magic made sure your hair wouldn't get dirty from being dragged around. It was always @@.girlVoice;smooth@@ and @@.girlVoice;silky@@. Despite that, you ''knew'' had to brush it daily to keep it that way. It would take ages, but there was something soothing about @@.girlVoice;running a brush through your hair@@. Even when you didn't have a brush you often found yourself distractedly @@.girlVoice;running your fingers@@ through it or @@.girlVoice;fiddling@@ with a lock. <</if>>\ <<if $traitCatgirl == 1>>\ ''Nekomimi'' A rather unusual curse has left you with a few feline features. You have @@.girlVoice;adorable@@ cat ears poking out of the top of your head. The fur on them is incredibly soft, but it tickles if people touch them wrong. Your canine teeth have also gotten way sharper, and one of those @@.girlVoice;cute little fangs@@ seems to always be showing. You're also a little more @@.girlVoice;playful@@ and @@.girlVoice;energetic@@ than before, but it also makes you easier to distract. <<elseif $traitCatgirl == 2>>\ <<if $playerAge <= 10>>''Catgirl''<<else>>''Catboy''<</if>> Your curse has progressed and you look even more @@.girlVoice;cat like@@ than before. You still have your ears and fangs, but now a long tail trailed out behind you. Sometimes you were able to control it but other times it seemed to have a mind of its own. Your nails have grown longer and are surprisingly sharp. Narrow, unmistakeably feline, slitted eyes have granted you excellent night vision. Oh, and you have an uncontrollable habit of sometimes ending sentences with a saccharine @@.girlVoice;"nya~" :3@@ <</if>>\ <<if $traitCuteVoice>>\ <<if $playerMaturity/2 + $playerAge <= 10>>\ ''Angelic Voice'' All @@.girlVoice;little girls@@ have @@.girlVoice;sweet@@ and @@.girlVoice;adorable@@ voices, but yours is exemplary. It's the @@.girlVoice;cutest little voice@@ by which all others will be judged. <<else>>\ ''Cute Voice'' No matter how hard you try your voice always comes out @@.girlVoice;cute@@ and @@.girlVoice;saccharine@@. <<if $playerAge <= 10>>It makes you sound like a girl @@.girlVoice;half your age@@.<<else>>It makes you @@.girlVoice;sound like a girl@@.<</if>> It wasn't just the natural @@.girlVoice;sweetness@@ of your voice, even the @@.girlVoice;way you spoke@@ exuded an air of @@.girlVoice;innocence@@. Of course it also makes it nearly impossible for anyone to take you seriously. <</if>> <</if>>\ <<if $traitBornToLose>> ''Born to Lose'' Emily's curse has turned you into a loser. You can't correctly guess a coin flip, your rolls always come up snake eyes, and you never seem to draw the card you want. No matter what game, sport or activity you pick, you can't win, and yet you can't figure out why. As disastrous as your luck seems to be your mind can't connect it back to Emily's curse. It just seems like another time when things didn't go your way. However, it's more than just bad luck. If required the very laws of the universe will bend to make sure you lose, //no matter what//. <</if>>\ <<if $traitBabyTalk>>\ ''Baby Talk'' <<if $playerMaturity >= 4>>\ Something has gone @@.girlVoice;wrong@@ with your speech. By your age you should have matured past the more common articulation errors. But you struggle with some sounds; "red" becomes "wed", "that" becomes "dat", 'bought' becomes 'bots', and that's just the start. Sometimes you missed whole syllables or dropped consonants. No matter how hard you try you sound more like a @@.girlVoice;toddler@@ than a $playerMaturity year old. <<elseif $playerMaturity >= 2>>\ Like most @@.girlVoice;toddlers@@ you struggle with some of the more basic speech sounds: "red" becomes "wed", "that" becomes "dat", 'bought' becomes 'bots', and that's just the start. Sometimes you missed whole syllables or dropped consonants. No matter how hard you try you sound more like a @@.girlVoice;toddler@@ than a $playerMaturity year old. <</if>>\ <</if>>\ <<if $traitBabySister>>\ ''Baby Sister'' Your @@.girlVoice;sissie@@ Emily now always refers to you as her @@.girlVoice;baby sister@@. It's humiliating every time she refers to you that way, but you are seemingly incapable of correcting it. Worse you can only think of her as your @@.girlVoice;sissie@@, making it sound like you're too young to even be able to pronounce "sister". However, some annoying part of you likes how @@.girlVoice;cute@@ and @@.girlVoice;girly@@ it sounds. <<elseif $traitLittleSister>>\ ''Little Sister'' Your @@.girlVoice;big sister@@ Emily has decided that she's going to always call you her @@.girlVoice;little sister@@. <<if $playerAge >= 11>>The fact you were a boy didn't matter to her.<<elseif $playerAge >=9>>The fact that you are actual older didn't matter to her.<</if>> Plus with a little magical encouragement you can't even bring yourself to correct her, instead going along with it and reflexively calling her your @@.girlVoice;"big sister"@@. <</if>>\ <<if $traitMentalLock>>\ ''Mental Block'' Your mind seems to be stuck with the things you knew at $playerMaturity. No matter how many times you are taught a new lesson it never seems to stick. You can form memories okay, but new concepts just refuse to take purchase. <</if>>\ <<if $traitAgeLock>>\ ''Everlasting Youth'' Your body is stuck at age $playerAge. No matter how long you wait you never seem to get any bigger or any older. You aren't sure if this means you might live forever, but until then you're stuck eating off the kid's menu. <</if>>\<<silently>>\ <<if $playerMaturity <= 9>> <<set _journalTitle to "🌸 Diary 🌸">> <<if </div>\ <div class="achievement-title">\ <img class="achievement-icon" src="Images/Misc/traitNotif.png"> </div>\ </div>\ </div>\<span class="emilyVoice header">Emily</span> Height: 4' 3" Weight: 57 lbs Age: 8 Hair Colour: Blonde Favourite Activity: Ballet <<if $favouritePony === "Pinkie Pie">>Favourite Pony: Pinkie Pie <</if>>\ Attitude: <<if $emilyHappiness >= 9>>Best friends<<elseif $emilyHappiness >= 7>>Friendly<<elseif $emilyHappiness >=4>>Neutral<<elseif $emilyHappiness >= 2>>Unfriendly<<else>>Hated<</if>> ($emilyHappiness)Your \<<if $emilyHappiness <= 5>> \<<if $playerMaturity > 12>> \incredibly annoying \<<elseif $playerMaturity > 9>> \@@.girlVoice;pesky@@ \<<else>> \@@.girlVoice;big meanie@@ of a \<</if>> \<<else>> \<<if $playerMaturity > 12>> \not too bad \<<elseif $playerMaturity > 9>> \@@.girlVoice;wonderful@@ \<<else>> \@@.girlVoice;awesomely incredible@@ \<</if>> \<</if>> \<<if $playerAge > 10>> \little sister \<<elseif $playerAge > 7>> \sister \<<else>> \@@.girlVoice;big sis@@ \<</if>> \<<if $emilyHappiness > 8>> \ and @@.girlVoice;best friend@@ \<</if>>. \<<if $emilyHappiness <=5>> \Annoyingly smug and endlessly bratty. \<<else>> \<<if $playerMaturity > 10>> \Unusually self-assured and always high energy. \<<else>> \@@.girlVoice;Super confident@@ and always @@.girlVoice;playing with you.@@ \<</if>> \<</if>> \<<if $emilyHappiness <= 5>> \You found her massively aggravating, it felt like half the time she was acting more like a toddler than an eight year old. \<<elseif $playerMaturity > 10>> \She possessed a charming youthful energy that meant she was able to get along with everyone, even children younger than her. \<<else>> \She was @@.girlVoice;lots of fun@@ to play with and everyone loved being around her. \<</if>> \ The <<if $playerMaturity < 11>>@@.girlVoice;leader@@<<else>>ringleader<</if>> of the group, she always seemed to have some \<<if $emilyHappiness <= 5>> \scheme in the works \<<else>> \plan for you all \<</if>>. \Focused ballet training meant she was \<<if $playerMaturity < 12>> \so @@.girlVoice;elegant@@ and @@.girlVoice;beautiful@@ \<<if $playerMaturity < 9>> \, you wished you could @@.girlVoice;be like her@@ \<</if>>. \<<else>> \decently fit and quite graceful. \<</if>> \<<if $traitDancer>>Though you were no expert, she did seem pretty good at it and you @@.girlVoice;enjoyed watching her@@.<</if>>Her wavy blonde hair and rosy cheeks gave her an angelic look<<if $playerMaturity > 12>> to get away with murder. She knew this, and she used it relentlessly<</if>>. You couldn't count the number of times her <<if $playerMaturity < 12>>@@.girlVoice;adorable@@<<else>>annoying<</if>> giggle had gotten <<if $emilyHappiness > 7>>the @@.girlVoice;two of you@@<<else>>her<</if>> out of trouble. <<if $traitGiggly>>Though once she started @@.girlVoice;giggling@@ you couldn't help but @@.girlVoice;join in@@<</if>> Today she was wearing a sleeveless white dress with pink polka dots. It was fairly simple but undeniably cute and girly, which was her usual style. <<if $traitFashionista>>The lower half was actually two layers, with an under layer that was slightly longer and almost translucent, both had a pink trim. There was a lacy cinch around the midriff which lead to a tie on the low cut back.<</if>><<set _age to 16 - ($epilogueStartAge - 8)>>\ <<if $mallMadnessTransformation>><<set _age to 16>><</if>>\ <span class="emilyVoice header">Emily</span> Height: 5' 5" Weight: 123 lbs Age: _age Hair Colour: Blonde Favourite Activity: BalletEmily had blossomed into a full figured woman, taking after your mother's figure if not her countenance. While your mother was often intimidating Emily maintained much of her youthful demeanour. Long blonde hair fell all the way down to the small of her back and it always had a way of pleasingly catching the light. Her blue eyes alternated between a gentle invitation and a sparkling mischief, depending on her mood. Continued ballet training meant that she was shockingly fit, though not bulky.Your sister was one of the busiest girls that you knew. It seemed that she was in every club that existed in the school, including inventing a few herself. She sung, she danced, she was on the cheerleading team and she even got good marks to boot. Nothing on par with Kara, but she'd have a pick of colleges if that was her desired path. Yet she seemed determined to follow in your mother's footsteps. Her magical prowess had grown by leaps and bounds, something that she, annoyingly, often tested on you.<span class="mikiVoice header">Miki</span> Height: 3' 9" Weight: 46 lbs Age: 6 Hair Colour: Black <<if $mikiHappiness >= 5>>Favourite Activity: Colouring <</if>>\ <<if $mikiHappiness >= 7>>Favourite Princess: Sofia <</if>>\ <<if $favouritePony === "Fluttershy">>Favourite Pony: Fluttershy <</if>>\ Attitude: <<if $mikiHappiness >= 9>>Best friends<<elseif $mikiHappiness >= 7>>Friendly<<elseif $mikiHappiness >=4>>Neutral<<elseif $mikiHappiness >= 2>>Unfriendly<<else>>Hated<</if>> ($mikiHappiness)The youngest of the group<<if $playerAge < 6>>, @@.girlVoice;other than you@@<</if>>. Gone was the excess baby fat, leaving her slim and slight. She'd also shed that childish awkwardness. She wasn't particularly fit, but she knew how to handle herself. Though she hadn't grown upwards all that much, standing only a hair over five feet tall. Her diminutive stature and slender build gave her a rather adorable figure, matched by her near constant sunny disposition.Miki wasn't the strongest student, but she was living life to the fullest in high school. Everyone loved her and she easily made friends. Her pint-sized nature made her non-threatening and her relentless optimism made her a joy to be around. Despite that it was hard not to tease her, at least a little, it was so cute watching her try to rage. She often joked about hitting another growth spurt, shooting past all of you and getting her revenge, but you very much doubted it. This was as big as Miki was going to get, and as big as she'd want to be; she took an amusing amount of pride in being "fun sized".Of course you looked just like her, after all the two of you were the same in every way. No one else could understood the bond you two shared. It was more than friends, more than siblings, even more than twins. You knew everything about each other because you were each other. You'd get the same grades on a test, make the same mistakes, have the same questions undone when the bell rang. It didn't require any communication between the two of you, it was just the bond you shared. Emily occasionally decried it as "creepy" when the two of you talked fully in sync, but it never ceased to amuse you. You had the perfect playmate and partner for life, and she had the same in you.The two of you were quite the popular pair, amiable, socially outgoing, with seemingly endless friends and acquaintances. Inside and outside of class you were both always surrounded by your friends. The lunch table around you was always crowded and it felt like Miki had an invite to a house party nearly every night. Everyone knew that inviting one of you meant inviting both, so you also spent a lot of time partying. It wasn't good for either of your academics, but it did wonders for your social standing. Everyone wanted to be Miki's friend, //especially// the boys. Something she had a wicked habit of encouraging. Her adorable giggly nature meant most boys were immediately disarmed, something you teased her about relentlessly. She kept it loose most of the time, cascading down to her shoulders. However, it would be pinned back for competition. Her cool emerald eyes and numerous freckles gave her a captivating face with a cuteness that belied her intensity. Intense gymnastics training meant that she was incredibly fit. Stronger and faster than almost anyone her age, including the boys. Her body, while still feminine, was lithe and cut, giving her a rather imposing figure.Sophie was still the elder of the group and maintained a few inches over the rest of you, though she bemoaned the height. She liked being taller than everyone else, including you, but it did cause her some issues in gymnastics. Despite that she was still fiercely competitive and had even competed at the national level, though it seemed the Olympics were out of reach. Despite that she was still pushing forward with life, prepping for college entrance exams. She wasn't the best student, but she did alright. Well enough that, with work, she'd make it in. Though she admitted she didn't exactly know //what// she wanted to do yet.Sophie was still incredible. Not only was she competing at gymnastics at the highest level, but she was also the captain of the school cheerleading team. Even more impressive she was able to do all that while getting pretty darn good marks. She would be able to do whatever she wanted with her life. It made you feel rather inadequate, though she was always kind to you. That attention was often more than you could handle and close contact with her left you a blushing mess. You just wished she'd be more careful with herself, you were perpetually nursing her bumps and scrapes.Despite the two of you being the same age, Sophie always played the elder of the group. She still had a couple inches on you and that was apparently enough to justify her position. Though you knew that her height could be a problem in it's own right. Gymnasts were typically quite short. Despite that she was still fiercely competitive and the two of you continued pushing each other to new heights. The Olympics were a lofty goal but one that you were both pursing. Spotless jeans and a floral shirt covered by a denim jacket. Her wild hair was held back with a <<if $playerMaturity < 12>>@@.girlVoice;cute @@<</if>>pink headband. The light frames of her glasses completed the look, casual, but put together.<</if>><<set _age to 16 - ($epilogueStartAge - 7)>>\ <<if $mallMadnessTransformation>><<set _age to 16>><</if>>\ <span class="karaVoice header">Kara</span> Height: 5' 3" Weight: 110 lbs Age: _age Hair Colour: Brown Favourite Activity: ChessKara had grown up, but to you she looked almost the same as she had at seven. To this day she always tried to keep herself neat and put together, the image of a preppy girl, but something always went slightly wrong. Maybe her glasses went askew, or her hair was frizzy, or even her outfit didn't quite match. It was like her nerdy nature resisted her attempts. She always looked more at ease when she let loose. Letting her shy smile show her braces and wearing her favourite anime t-shirt.Kara was the smartest person you'd ever met. You didn't know how she'd compare on a global scale, but at her school she never failed to get top marks. This was a combination of a natural intelligence and an abundance of hard work. She spent far more time indoor studying than outside in the sun. This focus had left her little time for social pursuits and her friend group was fairly small. However, this was just how she liked it. She'd take a few close friends over a gaggle of shallow ones any day.Kara was the smartest and most beautiful person you'd ever met. You didn't know how she'd compare on a global scale, but she would always be number one in your eyes. This was a combination of a natural intelligence and an abundance of hard work. She spent far more time indoor studying than outside in the sun. It fell to you and the rest of the group to occasionally drag her out so people wouldn't think she was a vampire. Your feelings for her had started out as admiration, but have evolved into something far deeper. You love her, though you aren't quite ready to say it. You weren't even sure you were ready to kiss her, despite the encouragement of everyone else in your lives. The two of you could be so awkward that they felt compelled to rescue from your own clumsy flirting. You were meant for each other, you just had to take the last step.Kara was the smartest person you'd ever met. You were only a little jealous that you could never seem to outdo her. But you couldn't really be mad, she worked her butt off for those kind of grades. She spent far more time indoor studying than outside in the sun. Not that you were any better, if you weren't inside studying then the two of you were watching anime or reading comic books. Others might decry your pursuits as nerdy but...well...they were pretty nerdy. The two of you cosplayed at anime conventions. Was there anything nerdier than that? It was just that the two of you didn't care. Neither of you had much concern for what others thought about you. Cultivating one close friend was worth far more than trying to placate the plebeians at school by being "normal". Normal was boring. */ <<if $showAnimations && false>> <<capture _changeValue>> <<timed 0s>> <<append "#playerEmbarassment">><span id="playerEmbarassmentMinus" class="playerChangeStat">😳</span><</append>> <<timed 1s>> State.temporary.traitName, State.temporary.color, State.temporary.src) } } <</script>> <</timed>> <<set $playerHasAnyTrait to true>> <</silently>>\ <</widget>>\<<widget "SetPronouns">><<nobr>> /* _fullPath to $imgPath + _path>>\ <<if $showImages == true>>\ <img @src="_fullPath" @class="_class">\ <</if>>\ <</widget>>\ <<widget "favouritePonyWritten">>\ <<if $playerMaturity > 10>>$favouritePony\ <</silently>>\ \<<if $hairstyle > 0 && !_plainText>>@@.girlVoice; _hairStyleText@@\<<else>>_hairStyleText\<</if>>\ <</widget>>\ <<widget "playerVoice">> \<<set _text to $args[0]>> \<<set _playerVoiceNumber to getCurrentVoiceClass($playerAge, $playerMaturity)>> \<<set _voiceClass to "playerVoice" + _playerVoiceNumber + " playerVoice">> \<<set _skipFilter to false>> \<<silently>> <<if _text.contains('@@.girlVoice;')>> <<set _skipFilter to true>> <</if>> \<</silently>> \<<if $playerAge >= 11 && $playerAge <= 13 && !_skipFilter>> \<<set _wordArray to _text.split(" ")>> \<<for _i, _word range _wordArray>>\ \<<set _playerVoiceNumber to getCurrentVoiceClass($playerAge, $playerMaturity)>> \<<if ($playerAge === 12 || $playerAge === 13 && random(100) <= 15) || ($playerAge === 11 && random(100) <= 30)>> \<<set _playerVoiceNumber+=2>> \<</if>> \<<set _playerVoiceNumber to Math.min(_playerVoiceNumber, 8)>> \<<set _voiceClass to "playerVoice" + _playerVoiceNumber + " playerVoice">> \<<if _i === _wordArray.length - 1>> \<span @class="_voiceClass">_word</span> \<<else>> \<span @class="_voiceClass">_word </span> \<</if>> \<</for>> \<<else>> \<span @class="_voiceClass">_text</span> \<</if>> \<</widget>>\ <<widget "playerName">><<if $girlName === "">>$playerName<<else>>@@.girlVoice;$girlName@@<</if>><</widget>>\ <<widget "playerTitle">><<if $traitBabySister || $playerAge <= 6>>@@.girlVoice;baby sister@@<<elseif $traitLittleSister || $playerAge <= 8>>@@.girlVoice;little sister@@<<elseif $playerAge <= 10>>@@.girlVoice;big sister@@<<elseif $playerAge <= $(document.createElement('div')) .wiki(Story.get(State.temporary.passageTitle).processText()) .get(0) .innerHTML; State.variables.journalEntries.push({ age: State.variables.playerAge, maturity: State.variables.playerMaturity, name: State.temporary.activityTitle, type: State.temporary.entryType, text: resultHtml }); State.variables.newJournalEntry = true; <</script>> <</silently>> <</widget>>\ <<widget "saveEnding">>\ <<silently>>\ <<set _characterName to $args[0]>> <<set _endingNumber to $args[1]>> <<set _endingSaveString to "ending" + _endingNumber + "Seen">> <<switch _characterName>> <<case "Kara">> <<run memorize('hasSeenKaraEnding', true)>> <<case "Miki">> <<run memorize('hasSeenMikiEnding', true)>> <<case "Emily">> <<run memorize('hasSeenEmilyEnding', true)>> <<silently>>\ <<set _result to $args[0]>> <<set _total to $args[1]>> <<set _randomRoll to $args[2]>> <<set _modifiers to $args[3]>> <</silently>>\ <div class="dieRoll">\ <<if _result === "success">><span class="dieRollSuccess">Success</span><<else>><span class="dieRollFailure">Failure</span><</if>> <span class="dieRollExplain">\ <table>\ <tr><td>Base _modifiers[_i][1]>></td></tr>\ <<else>>\ <tr><td class="dieRollSuccess">_modifiers[_i][0]</td><td class="dieRollSuccess">+<<print _modifiers[_i][1]>></td></tr>\ <</if>>\ <</for>>\ <tr><td>''Total:''</td><td><<print _total>></td></tr>\ </table>\ </span>\ </div>\ <</widget>>\
